word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的肉身和我的內心雖然漸漸衰弱，　神卻永遠是我心裡的磐石，是我的業分。
word.korean: 내 육체와 마음은 쇠잔하나 하나님은 내 마음의 반석이시요 영원한 분깃이시라
word.tagalog: Ang aking laman at ang aking puso ay nanglulupaypay: nguni't ang Dios ay kalakasan ng aking puso, at bahagi ko magpakailan man.
word.maori: Hemo iho oku kikokiko me toku ngakau: ko te Atua ia te kaha o toku ngakau, toku wahi ake ake.
word.cebuano: Ang akong unod ug ang akong kasingkasing nangaluya; Apan ang Dios mao ang kalig-on sa akong kasingkasing, ug ang akong bahin sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: כו  כלה שארי ולבבי    צור-לבבי וחלקי--אלהים לעולם
word.hebrewmodern: כלה שארי ולבבי צור לבבי וחלקי אלהים לעולם׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thou didst divide the sea by thy strength: thou brakest the heads of the dragons in the waters.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงแยกทะเลด้วยฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงหักหัวมังกรในน้ำ
word.spanish1909: Tú hendiste la mar con tu fortaleza: Quebrantaste cabezas de ballenas en las aguas.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Tu, con la tua forza, spartisti il mare, tu spezzasti il capo ai mostri marini sulle acque,
word.german1912: Du zertrennst das Meer durch dein Kraft und zerbrichst die Köpfe der Drachen im Wasser.
word.french1910: Tu as fendu la mer par ta puissance, Tu as brisé les têtes des monstres sur les eaux;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你曾用你的大能分開大海，把海中怪獸的頭都打碎了。
word.korean: 주께서 주의 능력으로 바다를 나누시고 물 가운데 용들의 머리를 깨뜨리셨으며
word.tagalog: Iyong hinawi ang dagat sa iyong kalakasan: iyong pinagbasag ang mga ulo ng mga buwaya sa mga tubig.
word.maori: Nau, na tou kaha i wawae te moana: pakaru ana i a koe nga matenga o nga tarakona i nga wai.
word.cebuano: Imong gibahin ang dagat pinaagi sa imong kusog: Imong gidugmok ang mga ulo sa mga mananap sa mga tubig.
word.hebrew: יג  אתה פוררת בעזך ים    שברת ראשי תנינים על-המים
word.hebrewmodern: אתה פוררת בעזך ים שברת ראשי תנינים על המים׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thou art the God that doest wonders: thou hast declared thy strength among the people.
word.thailand: พระองค์คือพระเจ้าผู้ทรงกระทำการมหัศจรรย์ ผู้ทรงสำแดงฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์ท่ามกลางชนชาติทั้งหลาย
word.spanish1909: Tú eres el Dios que hace maravillas: Tú hiciste notoria en los pueblos tu fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: et deduxit eos in nube diei, et tota nocte in illuminatione ignis.
word.italian1927: Tu sei l’Iddio che fai maraviglie; tu hai fatto conoscere la tua forza fra i popoli.
word.german1912: Du bist der Gott, der Wunder tut; du hast deine Macht bewiesen unter den Völkern.
word.french1910: Tu es le Dieu qui fait des prodiges; Tu as manifesté parmi les peuples ta puissance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你是行奇事的　神，你在萬民中顯明你的能力。
word.korean: 주는 기사를 행하신 하나님이시라 민족들 중에 주의 능력을 알으시고
word.tagalog: Ikaw ay Dios na gumagawa ng mga kagilagilalas: iyong ipinakilala ang kalakasan mo sa gitna ng mga tao.
word.maori: Ko koe te Atua e mahi nei i nga mea whakamiharo: kua whakapuakina e koe tou kaha i waenganui o nga iwi.
word.cebuano: Ikaw mao ang Dios nga nagabuhat ug mga katingalahan: Gipahayag mo sa mga katawohan ang imong kusog.
word.hebrew: יד  אלהים בקדש דרכך    מי-אל גדול כאלהים
word.hebrewmodern: אתה האל עשה פלא הודעת בעמים עזך׃
word.greekot: καὶ ὡδήγησεν αὐτοὺς ἐν νεφέλῃ ἡμέρας καὶ ὅλην τὴν νύκτα ἐν φωτισμῷ πυρός

word.kjv: We will not hide them from their children, shewing to the generation to come the praises of the LORD, and his strength, and his wonderful works that he hath done.
word.thailand: เราจะไม่ซ่อนไว้จากลูกหลานของเขา แต่จะบอกแก่ชั่วอายุที่กำลังเกิดมา ถึงการสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์ และฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์ และการมหัศจรรย์ซึ่งพระองค์ได้ทรงกระทำ
word.spanish1909: No las encubriremos á sus hijos, Contando á la generación venidera las alabanzas de Jehová, Y su fortaleza, y sus maravillas que hizo.
word.latinvulgate: Facti sumus opprobrium vicinis nostris, subsannatio et illusio his qui in circuitu nostro sunt.
word.italian1927: non lo celeremo ai loro figliuoli; diremo alla generazione avvenire le lodi dell’Eterno, e la sua potenza e le maraviglie ch’egli ha operato.
word.german1912: daß wir's nicht verhalten sollten ihren Kindern, die hernach kommen, und verkündigten den Ruhm des HERRN und seine Macht und seine Wunder, die er getan hat.
word.french1910: Nous ne le cacherons point à leurs enfants; Nous dirons à la génération future les louanges de l'Eternel, Et sa puissance, et les prodiges qu'il a opérés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我們不把這些事向他們的子孫隱瞞，卻要把耶和華應得的讚美、他的能力，和他所行的奇事，都向後代的人述說。
word.korean: 우리가 이를 그 자손에게 숨기지 아니하고 여호와의 영예와 그 능력과 기이한 사적을 후대에 전하리로다
word.tagalog: Hindi namin ikukubli sa kanilang mga anak, na isasaysay sa salin ng lahing darating ang mga pagpuri sa Panginoon, at ang kaniyang kalakasan, at ang kaniyang mga kagilagilalas na mga gawa na kaniyang ginawa.
word.maori: E kore e huna e matou i a ratou tamariki: me whakaatu ki to muri whakatupuranga nga whakamoemiti ki a Ihowa, me tona kaha, me ana mahi whakamiharo i mea ai ia.
word.cebuano: Dili kami magatago kanila gikan sa ilang mga anak, Sa pagsugilon sa kaliwatan nga umalabut sa mga pagdayeg ni Jehova, Ug sa iyang kusog, ug sa iyang katingalahang mga buhat nga iyang gihimo.
word.hebrew: ד  לא נכחד מבניהם--    לדור אחרון מספרים תהלות יהוה ועזוזו ונפלאתיו    אשר עשה
word.hebrewmodern: לא נכחד מבניהם לדור אחרון מספרים תהלות יהוה ועזוזו ונפלאותיו אשר עשה׃
word.greekot: ἐγενήθημεν ὄνειδος τοῖς γείτοσιν ἡμῶν μυκτηρισμὸς καὶ χλευασμὸς τοῖς κύκλῳ ἡμῶν

word.kjv: And smote all the firstborn in Egypt; the chief of their strength in the tabernacles of Ham:
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงประหารลูกหัวปีทั้งสิ้นในอียิปต์ คือผลแรกแห่งกำลังของเขาในเต็นท์ของฮาม
word.spanish1909: E hirió á todo primogénito en Egipto, Las primicias de las fuerzas en las tiendas de Châm.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Percosse tutti i primogeniti d’Egitto, le primizie del vigore nelle tende di Cham;
word.german1912: da er alle Erstgeburt in Ägypten schlug, die Erstlinge ihrer Kraft in den Hütten Hams,
word.french1910: Il frappa tous les premiers-nés en Egypte, Les prémices de la force sous les tentes de Cham.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他在埃及擊殺了所有的長子，在含的帳棚中擊殺了他們強壯時生的頭胎子。
word.korean: 애굽에서 모든 장자 곧 함의 장막에 있는 그 기력의 시작을 치셨으나
word.tagalog: At sinaktan ang lahat na panganay sa Egipto, ang panguna ng kanilang kalakasan sa mga tolda ni Cham:
word.maori: Na patua iho e ia nga matamua i Ihipa, te muanga o to ratou kaha i nga teneti o Hama.
word.cebuano: Ug gipamatay ang tanang mga panganay didto sa Egipto, Ang mga inunahan sa ilang kusog didto sa balong-balong ni Ham.
word.hebrew: נא  ויך כל-בכור במצרים    ראשית אונים באהלי-חם
word.hebrewmodern: ויך כל בכור במצרים ראשית אונים באהלי חם׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And delivered his strength into captivity, and his glory into the enemy's hand.
word.thailand: และทรงมอบฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์แก่การเป็นเชลย และสง่าราศีของพระองค์แก่มือของคู่อริ
word.spanish1909: Y dió en cautividad su fortaleza, Y su gloria en mano del enemigo.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: e lasciò menare la sua Forza in cattività, e lasciò cader la sua Gloria in man del nemico.
word.german1912: und gab seine Macht ins Gefängnis und seine Herrlichkeit in die Hand des Feindes
word.french1910: Il livra sa gloire à la captivité, Et sa majesté entre les mains de l'ennemi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他又把象徵他權能的約櫃交給人擄去，把他的榮美交在敵人的手裡，
word.korean: 그 능력된 자를 포로에 붙이시며 자기 영광을 대적의 손에 붙이시고
word.tagalog: At ibinigay ang kaniyang kalakasan sa pagkabihag, at ang kaniyang kaluwalhatian ay sa kamay ng kaaway.
word.maori: A tukua ana e ia tona kaha hei whakarau, tona kororia ki te ringa o te hoariri.
word.cebuano: Ug gitugyan niya ngadto sa pagkabinihag ang iyang kusog, Ug ang iyang himaya ngadto sa kamot sa kabatok.
word.hebrew: סא  ויתן לשבי עזו    ותפארתו ביד-צר
word.hebrewmodern: ויתן לשבי עזו ותפארתו ביד צר׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh stir up thy strength, and come and save us.
word.thailand: ต่อหน้าเอฟราอิม และเบนยามิน และมนัสเสห์ ขอทรงปลุกพระราชอำนาจของพระองค์ขึ้นมาช่วยข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายให้รอด
word.spanish1909: Despierta tu valentía delante de Ephraim, y de Benjamín, y de Manasés, Y ven á salvarnos.
word.latinvulgate: Exsultate Deo adjutori nostro, jubilate Deo Jacob.
word.italian1927: Dinanzi ad Efraim, a Beniamino ed a Manasse, risveglia la tua potenza, e vieni a salvarci!
word.german1912: Erwecke deine Gewalt, der du vor Ephraim, Benjamin und Manasse bist, und komm uns zu Hilfe!
word.french1910: Devant Ephraïm, Benjamin et Manassé, réveille ta force, Et viens à notre secours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在以法蓮、便雅憫和瑪拿西面前，求你施展你的大能，前來拯救我們。
word.korean: 에브라임과 베냐민과 므낫세 앞에서 주의 용력을 내사 우리를 구원하러 오소서
word.tagalog: Sa harap ng Ephraim, ng Benjamin at ng Manases, ay mapukaw nawa ang kapangyarihan mo, at parito kang iligtas mo kami.
word.maori: Whakaohoohokia tou kaha i te aroaro o Eparaima, o Pineamine, o Manahi: a haere mai ki te whakaora i a matou.
word.cebuano: Pakuwa ang imong kagahum sa atubangan ni Ephraim ug ni Benjamin ug ni Manases, Ug umari ka aron sa pagluwas kanamo.
word.hebrew: ב  רעה ישראל האזינה--    נהג כצאן יוסף ישב הכרובים    הופיעה
word.hebrewmodern: לפני אפרים ובנימן ומנשה עוררה את גבורתך ולכה לישעתה לנו׃
word.greekot: ἀγαλλιᾶσθε τῷ θεῷ τῷ βοηθῷ ἡμῶν ἀλαλάξατε τῷ θεῷ ιακωβ

word.kjv: Sing aloud unto God our strength: make a joyful noise unto the God of Jacob.
word.thailand: จงร้องเพลงถวายพระเจ้า พระกำลังของพวกเรา จงร้องเพลงด้วยเสียงดังถวายแด่พระเจ้าของยาโคบ
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: sobre Gittith: Salmo de Asaph. CANTAD á Dios, fortaleza nuestra: Al Dios de Jacob celebrad con júbilo.
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus Asaph. Deus stetit in synagoga deorum ; in medio autem deos dijudicat.
word.italian1927: Per il Capo de’ musici. Sulla Ghittea. Salmo di Asaf. Cantate con gioia a Dio nostra forza; mandate grida di allegrezza all’Iddio di Giacobbe!
word.german1912: Auf der Gittith, vorzusingen, Asaphs.  Singet fröhlich Gott, der unsre Stärke ist; jauchzt dem Gott Jakobs!
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Sur la guitthith. D'Asaph. Chantez avec allégresse à Dieu, notre force! Poussez des cris de joie vers le Dieu de Jacob!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 亞薩的詩，交給詩班長，用“迦特”的樂器。要向　神我們的力量歡呼，要向雅各的　神大聲呼叫。
word.korean: (아삽의 시. 영장으로 깃딧이 맞춘 노래) 우리 능력 되신 하나님께 높이 노래하며 야곱의 하나님께 즐거이 노래할지어다
word.tagalog: Magsiawit kayo ng malakas sa Dios na ating kalakasan: mangagkaingay kayo na may kagalakan sa Dios ni Jacob,
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. Kititi. Na Ahapa. Kia kaha te waiata ki te Atua, ki to tatou kaha: kia hari te hamama ki te Atua o Hakopa.
word.cebuano: Pag-awit sa makusog ngadto sa Dios nga atong kusog: Sa Dios ni Jacob managsinggit kamo ug usa ka kagahub sa kalipay.
word.hebrew: א  למנצח על-הגתית לאסף
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח על הגתית לאסף הרנינו לאלהים עוזנו הריעו לאלהי יעקב׃
word.greekot: ψαλμὸς τῷ ασαφ ὁ θεὸς ἔστη ἐν συναγωγῇ θεῶν ἐν μέσῳ δὲ θεοὺς διακρίνει

word.kjv: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; in whose heart are the ways of them.
word.thailand: ความสุขเป็นของบุคคลที่กำลังของเขาอยู่ในพระองค์ คือคนที่ในใจของเขาเป็นทางทั้งหลายของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Bienaventurado el hombre que tiene su fortaleza en ti; En cuyo corazón están tus caminos.
word.latinvulgate: Converte nos, Deus salutaris noster, et averte iram tuam a nobis.
word.italian1927: Beati quelli che hanno in te la loro forza, che hanno il cuore alle vie del Santuario!
word.german1912: Wohl den Menschen, die dich für ihre Stärke halten und von Herzen dir nachwandeln,
word.french1910: Heureux ceux qui placent en toi leur appui! Ils trouvent dans leur coeur des chemins tout tracés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 靠你有力量，心中嚮往通到聖殿大道的，這人是有福的。
word.korean: 주께 힘을 얻고 그 마음에 시온의 대로가 있는 자는 복이 있나이다
word.tagalog: Mapalad ang tao na ang kalakasan ay nasa iyo; na may mga daan sa kaniyang puso na tungo sa Sion.
word.maori: Ka hari te tangata ko tona kaha nei kei a koe: kei roto i o ratou ngakau nga huarahi ki reira.
word.cebuano: Bulahan ang tawo nga kanimo anaa ang iyang kalig-on; Kinsang kasingkasing anaa ang mga dalan ngadto sa Sion .
word.hebrew: ה  אשרי יושבי ביתך--    עוד יהללוך סלה
word.hebrewmodern: אשרי אדם עוז לו בך מסלות בלבבם׃
word.greekot: ἐπίστρεψον ἡμᾶς ὁ θεὸς τῶν σωτηρίων ἡμῶν καὶ ἀπόστρεψον τὸν θυμόν σου ἀφ' ἡμῶν

word.kjv: They go from strength to strength, every one of them in Zion appeareth before God.
word.thailand: เขาไปด้วยมีกำลังมาเพิ่มขึ้นๆ เขาทั้งหลายจะเข้าเฝ้าพระเจ้าในศิโยน
word.spanish1909: Irán de fortaleza en fortaleza, Verán á Dios en Sión.
word.latinvulgate: Deus, tu conversus vivificabis nos, et plebs tua lætabitur in te.
word.italian1927: Essi vanno di forza in forza, e compariscono alfine davanti a Dio in Sion.
word.german1912: Sie erhalten einen Sieg nach dem andern, daß man sehen muß, der rechte Gott sei zu Zion.
word.french1910: Leur force augmente pendant la marche, Et ils se présentent devant Dieu à Sion.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們行走，力上加力，直到各人在錫安朝見　神。
word.korean: 저희는 힘을 얻고 더 얻어 나아가 시온에서 하나님 앞에 각기 나타나리이다
word.tagalog: Sila'y nagsisiyaon sa kalakasa't kalakasan, bawa't isa sa kanila ay napakikita sa harap ng Dios sa Sion.
word.maori: Ka haere atu ratou i te kaha ki te kaha; ka kitea ratou ki te aroaro o te Atua i Hiona.
word.cebuano: Nanagpanlakaw sila gikan sa kalig-on paingon ngadto sa kaligon; Tagsatagsa kanila mangatubang sa Dios sa Sion.
word.hebrew: ז  עברי בעמק הבכא--    מעין ישיתוהו גם-ברכות    יעטה מורה
word.hebrewmodern: ילכו מחיל אל חיל יראה אל אלהים בציון׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεός σὺ ἐπιστρέψας ζωώσεις ἡμᾶς καὶ ὁ λαός σου εὐφρανθήσεται ἐπὶ σοί

word.kjv: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.
word.thailand: ขอทรงหันมาเมตตาข้าพระองค์ ขอประทานกำลังแก่ผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์ และขอทรงช่วยชีวิตบุตรชายของหญิงคนใช้ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Mírame, y ten misericordia de mí: Da tu fortaleza á tu siervo, Y guarda al hijo de tu sierva.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Volgiti a me, ed abbi pietà di me; da’ la tua forza al tuo servitore, e salva il figliuolo della tua servente.
word.german1912: Wende dich zu mir, sei mir gnädig; stärke deinen Knecht mit deiner Kraft und hilf dem Sohn deiner Magd!
word.french1910: Tourne vers moi les regards et aie pitié de moi, Donne la force à ton serviteur, Et sauve le fils de ta servante!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你轉向我，恩待我；把你的能力賜給你的僕人，拯救你婢女的兒子。
word.korean: 내게로 돌이키사 나를 긍휼히 여기소서 주의 종에게 힘을 주시고 주의 여종의 아들을 구원하소서
word.tagalog: Oh bumalik ka sa akin, at maawa ka sa akin; ibigay mo ang lakas mo sa iyong lingkod. At iligtas mo ang anak ng iyong lingkod na babae.
word.maori: Tahuri mai ki ahau, tohungia hoki ahau: homai tou kaha ki tau pononga, whakaorangia te tama a tau pononga wahine.
word.cebuano: Oh lingia ako, ug malooy ka kanako. Ihatag ang imong kalig-on sa imong ulipon, Ug luwasa ang anak nga lalake sa imong ulipon nga babaye.
word.hebrew: טז  פנה אלי וחנני    תנה-עזך לעבדך והושיעה לבן-אמתך
word.hebrewmodern: פנה אלי וחנני תנה עזך לעבדך והושיעה לבן אמתך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man that hath no strength:
word.thailand: เขานับข้าพระองค์ในบรรดาผู้ที่ลงไปยังปากแดน ข้าพระองค์เป็นเหมือนชายที่ไม่มีกำลัง
word.spanish1909: Soy contado con los que descienden al hoyo, Soy como hombre sin fuerza:
word.latinvulgate: Disposui testamentum electis meis ; juravi David, servo meo :
word.italian1927: Io son contato fra quelli che scendon nella fossa; son come un uomo che non ha più forza.
word.german1912: Ich bin geachtet gleich denen, die in die Grube fahren; ich bin ein Mann, der keine Hilfe hat.
word.french1910: Je suis mis au rang de ceux qui descendent dans la fosse, Je suis comme un homme qui n'a plus de force.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我被列在下坑的人中，就像一個沒有氣力的人一樣。
word.korean: 나는 무덤에 내려가는 자와 함께 인정되고 힘이 없는 사람과 같으며
word.tagalog: Ako'y nabilang sa kanila na nagsisibaba sa hukay; ako'y parang taong walang lakas:
word.maori: Kua taua tahitia ahau me te hunga e heke ana ki te rua; e rite ana ahau ki te tangata kahore ona awhina!
word.cebuano: Naisip na ako nga uban niadtong nanganaug ngadto sa lubnganan; Ako ingon sa usa ka tawo nga walay makatabang,
word.hebrew: ד  כי-שבעה ברעות נפשי    וחיי לשאול הגיעו
word.hebrewmodern: נחשבתי עם יורדי בור הייתי כגבר אין איל׃
word.greekot: διεθέμην διαθήκην τοῖς ἐκλεκτοῖς μου ὤμοσα δαυιδ τῷ δούλῳ μου

word.kjv: For thou art the glory of their strength: and in thy favour our horn shall be exalted.
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์ทรงเป็นสง่าราศีแห่งกำลังของเขาทั้งหลาย แต่โดยความโปรดปรานของพระองค์ เขาของข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายจะถูกเชิดชูขึ้น
word.spanish1909: Porque tú eres la gloria de su fortaleza; Y por tu buena voluntad ensalzarás nuestro cuerno.
word.latinvulgate: Et sit splendor Domini Dei nostri super nos ; et opera manuum nostrarum dirige super nos, et opus manuum nostrarum dirige.
word.italian1927: Perché tu sei la gloria della loro forza; e la nostra potenza è esaltata dal tuo favore.
word.german1912: Denn du bist der Ruhm ihrer Stärke, und durch dein Gnade wirst du unser Horn erhöhen.
word.french1910: Car tu es la gloire de sa puissance; C'est ta faveur qui relève notre force.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你是他們的榮耀和力量；因你的恩惠，我們的角得以高舉。
word.korean: 주는 저희 힘의 영광이심이라 우리 뿔이 주의 은총으로 높아지오리니
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ikaw ang kaluwalhatian ng kanilang kalakasan: at sa iyong lingap ay matataas ang aming sungay.
word.maori: Ko koe hoki te kororia o to ratou kaha: ma tau manako ano ka ara ai to matou haona.
word.cebuano: Kay ikaw mao ang himaya sa ilang kalig-on; Ug tungod sa imong kahamuot ang among sungay pagabayawon.
word.hebrew: יז  בשמך יגילון כל-היום    ובצדקתך ירומו
word.hebrewmodern: כי תפארת עזמו אתה וברצנך תרים קרננו׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἔστω ἡ λαμπρότης κυρίου τοῦ θεοῦ ἡμῶν ἐφ' ἡμᾶς καὶ τὰ ἔργα τῶν χειρῶν ἡμῶν κατεύθυνον ἐφ' ἡμᾶς

word.kjv: With whom my hand shall be established: mine arm also shall strengthen him.
word.thailand: เพื่อว่ามือของเราจะอยู่กับเขาเป็นนิตย์ และแขนของเราจะเสริมกำลังของเขา
word.spanish1909: Mi mano será firme con él, Mi brazo también lo fortificará.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: la mia mano sarà salda nel sostenerlo, e il mio braccio lo fortificherà.
word.german1912: Meine Hand soll ihn erhalten und mein Arm soll ihn stärken.
word.french1910: Ma main le soutiendra, Et mon bras le fortifiera.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的手必堅立他，我的膀臂必堅固他。
word.korean: 내 손이 저와 함께 하여 견고히 하고 내 팔이 그를 힘이 있게 하리로다
word.tagalog: Na siyang itatatag ng aking kamay; palakasin naman siya ng aking bisig.
word.maori: Ka u atu toku ringa hei awhina mona: ma toku takakau ano ia e whakakaha.
word.cebuano: Nga kaniya ang akong kamot mapalig-on; Ang akong bukton magapabaskug kaniya.
word.hebrew: כא  מצאתי דוד עבדי    בשמן קדשי משחתיו
word.hebrewmodern: אשר ידי תכון עמו אף זרועי תאמצנו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The days of our years are threescore years and ten; and if by reason of strength they be fourscore years, yet is their strength labour and sorrow; for it is soon cut off, and we fly away.
word.thailand: กำหนดปีของข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายคือเจ็ดสิบหรือถ้าเป็นเหตุจากมีกำลังก็ถึงแปดสิบ แต่ช่วงชีวิตนั้นมีแต่งานและความโศกเศร้า ไม่ช้าก็สูญไปและข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายก็จากไป
word.spanish1909: Los días de nuestra edad son setenta años; Que si en los más robustos son ochenta años, Con todo su fortaleza es molestia y trabajo; Porque es cortado presto, y volamos.
word.latinvulgate: Non accedet ad te malum, et flagellum non appropinquabit tabernaculo tuo.
word.italian1927: I giorni de’ nostri anni arrivano a settant’anni; o, per i più forti, a ottant’anni; e quel che ne fa l’orgoglio, non è che travaglio e vanità; perché passa presto, e noi ce ne voliam via.
word.german1912: Unser Leben währet siebzig Jahre, und wenn's hoch kommt, so sind's achtzig Jahre, und wenn's köstlich gewesen ist, so ist es Mühe und Arbeit gewesen; denn es fährt schnell dahin, als flögen wir davon.
word.french1910: Les jours de nos années s'élèvent à soixante-dix ans, Et, pour les plus robustes, à quatre-vingts ans; Et l'orgueil qu'ils en tirent n'est que peine et misère, Car il passe vite, et nous nous envolons.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我們一生的年日是七十歲，如果強壯，可到八十歲，但其中可誇耀的，不過是勞苦愁煩；我們的年日轉眼即逝，我們也如飛而去了。
word.korean: 우리의 연수가 칠십이요 강건하면 팔십이라도 그 연수의 자랑은 수고와 슬픔 뿐이요 신속히 가니 우리가 날아가나이다
word.tagalog: Ang mga kaarawan ng aming mga taon ay pitong pung taon, o kung dahil sa kalakasan ay umaabot ng walong pung taon; gayon ma'y ang kanilang kapalaluan ay hirap at kapanglawan lamang; sapagka't madaling napapawi, at kami ay nagsisilipad.
word.maori: Ko nga ra o o matou tau e whitu tekau tau; a ki te whai kaha, ka waru tekau tau; heoi he mahi mauiui, he pouri to ratou kaha; ka hohoro hoki te hatepea atu, a ka rere atu matou.
word.cebuano: Ang mga adlaw sa among panuigon may kapitoan ka tuig, Kun bisan tungod sa kabaskug may kawaloan ka tuig; Bisan pa niana ang ilang garbo mao lamang ang kabudlay ug kasub-anan; Kay kini sa madali mosaylo, ug kami managpanlupad.
word.hebrew: י  ימי-שנותינו בהם שבעים שנה    ואם בגבורת שמונים שנה-- ורהבם    עמל ואון כי-גז חיש    ונעפה
word.hebrewmodern: ימי שנותינו בהם שבעים שנה ואם בגבורת שמונים שנה ורהבם עמל ואון כי גז חיש ונעפה׃
word.greekot: οὐ προσελεύσεται πρὸς σὲ κακά καὶ μάστιξ οὐκ ἐγγιεῖ τῷ σκηνώματί σου

word.kjv: The LORD reigneth, he is clothed with majesty; the LORD is clothed with strength, wherewith he hath girded himself: the world also is stablished, that it cannot be moved.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงครอบครอง พระองค์ทรงสวมความยิ่งใหญ่ พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงสวมกำลัง พระองค์ทรงเอาพระกำลังคาดพระองค์ โลกได้สถาปนาไว้แล้ว มันจะไม่หวั่นไหว
word.spanish1909: JEHOVA reina, vistióse de magnificencia, Vistióse Jehová, ciñose de fortaleza; Afirmó también el mundo, que no se moverá.
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus ipsi David, quarta sabbati. Deus ultionum Dominus ; Deus ultionum libere egit.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno regna; egli s’è rivestito di maestà; l’Eterno s’è rivestito, s’è cinto di forza; il mondo quindi è stabile, e non sarà smosso.
word.german1912: Der HERR ist König und herrlich geschmückt; der HERR ist geschmückt und hat ein Reich angefangen, soweit die Welt ist, und zugerichtet, daß es bleiben soll.
word.french1910: L'Eternel règne, il est revêtu de majesté, L'Eternel est revêtu, il est ceint de force. Aussi le monde est ferme, il ne chancelle pas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱頌　神的威嚴和大能耶和華作王，他以威嚴為衣；耶和華以威嚴為衣，以能力束腰，世界就得以堅立，永不動搖。
word.korean: 여호와께서 통치하시니 스스로 권위를 입으셨도다 여호와께서 능력을 입으시며 띠셨으므로 세계도 견고히 서서 요동치 아니하도다
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay naghahari; siya'y nananamit ng karilagan; ang Panginoon ay nananamit ng kalakasan; siya'y nagbigkis niyaon: ang sanglibutan naman ay natatag, na hindi mababago.
word.maori: ¶ E kingi ana a Ihowa; he kororia tona kakahu; he kakahu to Ihowa, he mea whitiki ia ki te kaha: kua u hoki te ao, te taea te nekeneke.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova nagahari; nagabisti siya sa pagkahalangdon; Nagabisti si Jehova sa pagkaligon; gibaksan niya ang iyang kaugalingon niini: Gilig-on niya usab ang kalibutan, nga kini dili matarug.
word.hebrew: א  יהוה מלך    גאות לבש לבש יהוה עז התאזר    אף-תכון תבל בל-תמוט
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה מלך גאות לבש לבש יהוה עז התאזר אף תכון תבל בל תמוט׃
word.greekot: ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ τετράδι σαββάτων ὁ θεὸς ἐκδικήσεων κύριος ὁ θεὸς ἐκδικήσεων ἐπαρρησιάσατο

word.kjv: In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also.
word.thailand: ที่ลึกของแผ่นดินโลกอยู่ในพระหัตถ์ของพระองค์ ที่สูงของภูเขาเป็นของพระองค์ด้วย
word.spanish1909: Porque en su mano están las profundidades de la tierra, Y las alturas de los montes son suyas.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam magnus Dominus, et laudabilis nimis ; terribilis est super omnes deos ;
word.italian1927: Nelle sue mani stanno le profondità della terra, e le altezze de’ monti son sue.
word.german1912: Denn in seiner Hand ist, was unten in der Erde ist; und die Höhen der Berge sind auch sein.
word.french1910: Il tient dans sa main les profondeurs de la terre, Et les sommets des montagnes sont à lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 地的深處在他手中，山的高峰也都屬他。
word.korean: 땅의 깊은 곳이 그 위에 있으며 산들의 높은 것도 그의 것이로다
word.tagalog: Na sa kaniyang kamay ang mga malalim na dako ng lupa, ang mga kataasan ng mga bundok ay kaniya rin.
word.maori: Kei tona ringa nga wahi hohonu o te whenua: a nana nga maunga teitei.
word.cebuano: Sa iyang kamot anaa ang mga kahiladman sa yuta; Ang mga kahitas-an sa kabukiran iya man usab.
word.hebrew: ד  אשר בידו מחקרי-ארץ    ותועפת הרים לו
word.hebrewmodern: אשר בידו מחקרי ארץ ותועפות הרים לו׃
word.greekot: ὅτι μέγας κύριος καὶ αἰνετὸς σφόδρα φοβερός ἐστιν ἐπὶ πάντας τοὺς θεούς

word.kjv: Honour and majesty are before him: strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
word.thailand: เกียรติและความสูงส่งมีอยู่ต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระองค์ กำลังและความงามอยู่ในสถานบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Alabanza y magnificencia delante de él: Fortaleza y gloria en su santuario.
word.latinvulgate: Annuntiaverunt cæli justitiam ejus ; et viderunt omnes populi gloriam ejus.
word.italian1927: Splendore e maestà stanno dinanzi a lui, forza e bellezza stanno nel suo santuario.
word.german1912: Es stehet herrlich und prächtig vor ihm und gehet gewaltig und löblich zu in seinem Heiligtum.
word.french1910: La splendeur et la magnificence sont devant sa face, La gloire et la majesté sont dans son sanctuaire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 尊榮和威嚴在他面前，能力和華美在他聖所之中。
word.korean: 존귀와 위엄이 그 앞에 있으며 능력과 아름다움이 그 성소에 있도다
word.tagalog: Karangalan at kamahalan ay nasa harap niya: kalakasan at kagandahan ay nasa kaniyang santuario.
word.maori: He honore, he kororia kei tona aroaro: kei tona wahi tapu te kaha me te ataahua.
word.cebuano: Kadungganan ug kahalangdon anaa sa atubangan niya; Kalig-on ug katahum anaa sa iyang balaan nga puloy-anan.
word.hebrew: ו  הוד-והדר לפניו    עז ותפארת במקדשו
word.hebrewmodern: הוד והדר לפניו עז ותפארת במקדשו׃
word.greekot: ἀνήγγειλαν οἱ οὐρανοὶ τὴν δικαιοσύνην αὐτοῦ καὶ εἴδοσαν πάντες οἱ λαοὶ τὴν δόξαν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Give unto the LORD, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.
word.thailand: โอ ตระกูลของชนชาติทั้งหลายเอ๋ย จงถวายแด่พระเยโฮวาห์ จงถวายสง่าราศีและกำลังแด่พระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Dad á Jehová, oh familias de los pueblos, Dad á Jehová la gloria y la fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: Confundantur omnes qui adorant sculptilia, et qui gloriantur in simulacris suis. Adorate eum omnes angeli ejus.
word.italian1927: Date all’Eterno, o famiglie dei popoli, date all’Eterno gloria e forza.
word.german1912: Ihr Völker, bringet her dem HERRN, bringet her dem HERRN Ehre und Macht.
word.french1910: Familles des peuples, rendez à l'Eternel, Rendez à l'Eternel gloire et honneur!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 列國的萬族啊！你們要歸給耶和華，要把榮耀和能力歸給耶和華。
word.korean: 만방의 족속들아 영광과 권능을 여호와께 돌릴지어다 ! 여호와께 돌릴지어다 !
word.tagalog: Magbigay kayo sa Panginoon, kayong mga angkan ng mga bayan, magbigay kayo sa Panginoon ng kaluwalhatian at kalakasan.
word.maori: Waiho atu i a Ihowa, e nga hapu katoa o nga iwi: waiho atu i a Ihowa te kororia me te kaha.
word.cebuano: Ihatag ninyo kang Jehova, Oh kamong mga kaubanan sa mga katawohan, Ipahanungod ngadto kang Jehova himaya ug kusog.
word.hebrew: ז  הבו ליהוה משפחות עמים    הבו ליהוה כבוד ועז
word.hebrewmodern: הבו ליהוה משפחות עמים הבו ליהוה כבוד ועז׃
word.greekot: αἰσχυνθήτωσαν πάντες οἱ προσκυνοῦντες τοῖς γλυπτοῖς οἱ ἐγκαυχώμενοι ἐν τοῖς εἰδώλοις αὐτῶν προσκυνήσατε αὐτῷ πάντες οἱ ἄγγελοι αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: The king's strength also loveth judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.
word.thailand: ฤทธานุภาพของกษัตริย์ทรงรักความยุติธรรม พระองค์ทรงสถาปนาความเที่ยงตรง พระองค์ทรงประกอบความยุติธรรมและความชอบธรรมขึ้นในยาโคบ
word.spanish1909: Y la gloria del rey ama el juicio: Tú confirmas la rectitud; Tú has hecho en Jacob juicio y justicia.
word.latinvulgate: Introite portas ejus in confessione, atria ejus in hymnis ; confitemini illi. Laudate nomen ejus,
word.italian1927: Lodino la forza del Re che ama la giustizia; sei tu che hai fondato il diritto, che hai esercitato in Giacobbe il giudicio e la giustizia.
word.german1912: Im Reich dieses Königs hat man das Recht lieb. Du gibst Frömmigkeit, du schaffest Gericht und Gerechtigkeit in Jakob.
word.french1910: Qu'on célèbre la force du roi qui aime la justice! Tu affermis la droiture, Tu exerces en Jacob la justice et l'équité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 王有能力（“王有能力”原文作“王的能力”），喜愛公正；你堅立正義；你在雅各家施行公正和公義。
word.korean: 왕의 능력은 공의를 사랑하는 것이라 주께서 공평을 견고히 세우시고 야곱 중에서 공과 의를 행하시나이다
word.tagalog: Ang lakas naman ng hari ay umiibig ng kahatulan; ikaw ay nagtatatag ng karampatan, ikaw ay nagsasagawa ng kahatulan at katuwiran sa Jacob.
word.maori: E matenui ana hoki te kaha o te kingi ki te whakawa tika; ko koe hei whakapumau i te pono: he whakawa tika, he hekore tau mahi i roto i a Hakopa.
word.cebuano: Ang kalig-on sa hari nahigugma usab sa justicia; Ikaw nagatukod sa pagkatul-id; Ikaw nagapatuman ug justicia ug pagkamatarung diha kang Jacob.
word.hebrew: ד  ועז מלך    משפט אהב אתה כוננת מישרים    משפט וצדקה ביעקב אתה עשית
word.hebrewmodern: ועז מלך משפט אהב אתה כוננת מישרים משפט וצדקה ביעקב אתה עשית׃
word.greekot: εἰσέλθατε εἰς τὰς πύλας αὐτοῦ ἐν ἐξομολογήσει εἰς τὰς αὐλὰς αὐτοῦ ἐν ὕμνοις ἐξομολογεῖσθε αὐτῷ αἰνεῖτε τὸ ὄνομα αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: He weakened my strength in the way; he shortened my days.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงหักกำลังของข้าพเจ้ากลางทาง พระองค์ทรงกระทำให้วันเวลาของข้าพเจ้าสั้นเข้า
word.spanish1909: El afligió mi fuerza en el camino; Acortó mis días.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Egli ha abbattuto le mie forze durante il mio cammino; ha accorciato i miei giorni.
word.german1912: Er demütigt auf dem Wege meine Kraft; er verkürzt meine Tage.
word.french1910: Il a brisé ma force dans la route, Il a abrégé mes jours.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華在我壯年的時候，使我的力量衰弱，縮短我的年日。
word.korean: 저가 내 힘을 중도에 쇠약케 하시며 내 날을 단촉케 하셨도다
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pinahina ang aking kalakasan sa daan; kaniyang pinaikli ang mga kaarawan ko.
word.maori: ¶ Whakangoikoretia iho e ia toku kaha i te ara: kua torutoru i a ia oku ra.
word.cebuano: Iyang gipaluya ang akong kusog diha sa dalan; Gipahamubo niya ang akong mga adlaw.
word.hebrew: כג  בהקבץ עמים יחדו    וממלכות לעבד את-יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: ענה בדרך כחו קצר ימי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Bless the LORD, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่ท่านทั้งหลาย ผู้เป็นทูตสวรรค์ของพระองค์ จงถวายสาธุการแด่พระเยโฮวาห์ ท่านผู้ทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์ ผู้กระทำตามพระบัญชาของพระองค์ และเชื่อฟังเสียงพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Bendecid á Jehová, vosotros sus ángeles, Poderosos en fortaleza, que ejecutáis su palabra, Obedeciendo á la voz de su precepto.
word.latinvulgate: Posuisti tenebras, et facta est nox ; in ipsa pertransibunt omnes bestiæ silvæ ;
word.italian1927: Benedite l’Eterno, voi suoi angeli, potenti e forti, che fate ciò ch’egli dice, ubbidendo alla voce della sua parola!
word.german1912: Lobet den HERRN, ihr seine Engel, ihr starken Helden, die ihr seine Befehle ausrichtet, daß man höre auf die Stimme seines Wortes!
word.french1910: Bénissez l'Eternel, vous ses anges, Qui êtes puissants en force, et qui exécutez ses ordres, En obéissant à la voix de sa parole!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們作他天使的，就是那些大有能力，行他所吩咐，以及聽從他命令的，都要稱頌耶和華。
word.korean: 능력이 있어 여호와의 말씀을 이루며 그 말씀의 소리를 듣는 너희 천사여 여호와를 송축하라
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon, ninyong mga anghel niya: ninyong makapangyarihan sa kalakasan na gumaganap ng kaniyang salita, na nakikinig sa tinig ng kaniyang salita.
word.maori: Whakapaingia a Ihowa, e ana anahera, e hira nei te kaha, e whakarite nei i tana kupu, e whakarongo nei ki tona reo ina korero.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova, kamo nga mga manolonda niya, Nga mga gamhanan sa kalig-on nga nanagtuman sa iyang pulong, Nga nanagpatalinghug sa tingog sa iyang pulong.
word.hebrew: כ  ברכו יהוה    מלאכיו גברי כח עשי דברו    לשמע בקול דברו
word.hebrewmodern: ברכו יהוה מלאכיו גברי כח עשי דברו לשמע בקול דברו׃
word.greekot: ἔθου σκότος καὶ ἐγένετο νύξ ἐν αὐτῇ διελεύσονται πάντα τὰ θηρία τοῦ δρυμοῦ

word.kjv: And wine that maketh glad the heart of man, and oil to make his face to shine, and bread which strengtheneth man's heart.
word.thailand: และน้ำองุ่นซึ่งให้ใจมนุษย์ยินดี น้ำมันเพื่อทำให้หน้าของเขาทอแสง และขนมปังซึ่งเสริมกำลังใจมนุษย์
word.spanish1909: Y el vino que alegra el corazón del hombre, Y el aceite que hace lucir el rostro, Y el pan que sustenta el corazón del hombre.
word.latinvulgate: Nolite tangere christos meos, et in prophetis meis nolite malignari.
word.italian1927: e il vino che rallegra il cuor dell’uomo, e l’olio che gli fa risplender la faccia, e il pane che sostenta il cuore dei mortali.
word.german1912: und daß der Wein erfreue des Menschen Herz, daß seine Gestalt schön werde vom Öl und das Brot des Menschen Herz stärke;
word.french1910: Le vin qui réjouit le coeur de l'homme, Et fait plus que l'huile resplendir son visage, Et le pain qui soutient le coeur de l'homme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 又有酒使人心歡喜，有油使人容光煥發，有糧加添人的心力。
word.korean: 여호와의 나무가 우택에 흡족함이여 곧 그의 심으신 레바논 백향목이로다
word.tagalog: At ng alak na nagpapasaya sa puso ng tao, at ng langis upang pasilangin ang kaniyang mukha, at ng tinapay na nagpapalakas ng puso ng tao.
word.maori: He waina hei whakahari i te ngakau o te tangata, he hinu e piata ai tona mata, me te taro hei whakakaha i te ngakau o te tangata.
word.cebuano: Ug sa vino nga makalipay sa kasingkasing sa tawo, Ug lana nga makapasinaw sa nawong, Ug sa tinapay nga makapalig-on sa kasingkasing sa tawo.
word.hebrew: טו  ויין ישמח לבב-אנוש--    להצהיל פנים משמן ולחם    לבב-אנוש יסעד
word.hebrewmodern: ויין ישמח לבב אנוש להצהיל פנים משמן ולחם לבב אנוש יסעד׃
word.greekot: μὴ ἅπτεσθε τῶν χριστῶν μου καὶ ἐν τοῖς προφήταις μου μὴ πονηρεύεσθε

word.kjv: Seek the LORD, and his strength: seek his face evermore.
word.thailand: จงแสวงหาพระเยโฮวาห์ และพระกำลังของพระองค์ แสวงพระพักตร์ของพระองค์เรื่อยไป
word.spanish1909: Buscad á Jehová, y su fortaleza: Buscad siempre su rostro.
word.latinvulgate: Memento nostri, Domine, in beneplacito populi tui ; visita nos in salutari tuo :
word.italian1927: Cercate l’Eterno e la sua forza, cercate del continuo la sua faccia!
word.german1912: Fraget nach dem HERRN und nach seiner Macht, suchet sein Antlitz allewege!
word.french1910: Ayez recours à l'Eternel et à son appui, Cherchez continuellement sa face!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要追求耶和華與他的能力，常常尋求他的面。
word.korean: 여호와와 그 능력을 구할지어다 그 얼굴을 항상 구할지어다
word.tagalog: Hanapin ninyo ang Panginoon at ang kaniyang kalakasan; hanapin ninyo ang kaniyang mukha magpakailan man.
word.maori: Rapua a Ihowa me tona kaha: rapua tonutia tona mata, ake ake.
word.cebuano: Pangitaa ninyo si Jehova ug ang iyang kalig-on; Pangitaa ninyo sa gihapon ang iyang nawong.
word.hebrew: ד  דרשו יהוה ועזו    בקשו פניו תמיד
word.hebrewmodern: דרשו יהוה ועזו בקשו פניו תמיד׃
word.greekot: μνήσθητι ἡμῶν κύριε ἐν τῇ εὐδοκίᾳ τοῦ λαοῦ σου ἐπίσκεψαι ἡμᾶς ἐν τῷ σωτηρίῳ σου

word.kjv: He smote also all the firstborn in their land, the chief of all their strength.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงสังหารบรรดาลูกหัวปีในแผ่นดินของเขา คือผลแรกแห่งกำลังทั้งสิ้นของเขา
word.spanish1909: Hirió además á todos los primogénitos en su tierra, El principio de toda su fuerza.
word.latinvulgate: et servierunt sculptilibus eorum, et factum est illis in scandalum.
word.italian1927: Poi percosse tutti i primogeniti nel loro paese, le primizie d’ogni loro forza.
word.german1912: Er schlug alle Erstgeburt in Ägypten, alle Erstlinge ihrer Kraft.
word.french1910: Il frappa tous les premiers-nés dans leur pays, Toutes les prémices de leur force.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他擊殺了他們境內所有的長子，就是他們強壯的時候所生的頭生子。
word.korean: 여호와께서 또 저희 땅의 모든 장자를 치시니 곧 저희 모든 기력의 시작이로다
word.tagalog: Sinaktan din niya ang lahat na panganay sa kanilang lupain, ang puno ng lahat nilang kalakasan.
word.maori: I whakamatea katoatia ano hoki e ia nga matamua o to ratou whenua, te muanga o to ratou kaha.
word.cebuano: Gipamatay usab niya ang tanan nga panganay sa yuta nila, Ang sinugdanan sa tibook nila nga kusog.
word.hebrew: לו  ויך כל-בכור בארצם    ראשית לכל-אונם
word.hebrewmodern: ויך כל בכור בארצם ראשית לכל אונם׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐδούλευσαν τοῖς γλυπτοῖς αὐτῶν καὶ ἐγενήθη αὐτοῖς εἰς σκάνδαλον

word.kjv: Gilead is mine; Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;
word.thailand: กิเลอาดเป็นของเรา มนัสเสห์เป็นของเรา เอฟราอิมเป็นที่กันศีรษะของเรา ยูดาห์เป็นผู้ทรงตั้งพระราชบัญญัติของเรา
word.spanish1909: Mío es Galaad, mío es Manasés; Y Eprhaim es la fortaleza de mi cabeza; Judá es mi legislador;
word.latinvulgate: Fiant dies ejus pauci, et episcopatum ejus accipiat alter.
word.italian1927: Mio è Galaad e mio è Manasse, ed Efraim è la forte difesa del mio capo; Giuda è il mio scettro.
word.german1912: Gilead ist mein, Manasse ist auch mein, und Ephraim ist die Macht meines Hauptes, Juda ist mein Zepter,
word.french1910: A moi Galaad, à moi Manassé; Ephraïm est le rempart de ma tête, Et Juda, mon sceptre;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 基列是我的，瑪拿西是我的；以法蓮是我的頭盔；猶大是我的權杖，
word.korean: 길르앗이 내 것이요, 므낫세도 내 것이며 에브라임은 내 머리의 보호자요 유다는 나의 홀이며
word.tagalog: Galaad ay akin; Manases ay akin; ang Ephraim naman ay sanggalang ng aking ulo: Juda'y aking cetro.
word.maori: Noku Kireara; noku a Manahi; ko Eparaima ano hoki te kaha o toku matenga; ko Hura taku hepeta.
word.cebuano: Ang Galaad ako man; ang Manases ako; Ang Ephraim usab mao ang panalipod sa akong ulo; Ang Juda mao ang akong magbubuhat sa balaod.
word.hebrew: ח  אלהים דבר בקדשו--אעלזה    אחלקה שכם ועמק סכות אמדד
word.hebrewmodern: לי גלעד לי מנשה ואפרים מעוז ראשי יהודה מחקקי׃
word.greekot: γενηθήτωσαν αἱ ἡμέραι αὐτοῦ ὀλίγαι καὶ τὴν ἐπισκοπὴν αὐτοῦ λάβοι ἕτερος

word.kjv: The LORD shall send the rod of thy strength out of Zion: rule thou in the midst of thine enemies.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์จะทรงใช้คทาทรงฤทธิ์ของพระองค์ท่านไปจากศิโยน จงครอบครองท่ามกลางศัตรูของพระองค์ท่านเถิด
word.spanish1909: La vara de tu fortaleza enviará Jehová desde Sión: Domina en medio de tus enemigos.
word.latinvulgate: Magna opera Domini, exquisita in omnes voluntates ejus.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno estenderà da Sion lo scettro della sua potenza: Signoreggia in mezzo ai tuoi nemici!
word.german1912: Der HERR wird das Zepter deines Reiches senden aus Zion: "Herrsche unter deinen Feinden!"
word.french1910: L'Eternel étendra de Sion le sceptre de ta puissance: Domine au milieu de tes ennemis!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華必使你從錫安伸出能力的權杖，你要在你的仇敵中掌權。
word.korean: 여호와께서 시온에서부터 주의 권능의 홀을 내어 보내시리니 주는 원수 중에서 다스리소서
word.tagalog: Pararatingin ng Panginoon ang setro ng iyong kalakasan mula sa Sion: magpuno ka sa gitna ng iyong mga kaaway.
word.maori: Ma Ihowa e tono mai te tokotoko o tou kaha i Hiona: hei rangatira koe i waenganui i ou hoariri.
word.cebuano: Ang baras sa imong kalig-on igapadala ni Jehova gikan sa Sion: Magahari ka sa taliwala sa imong mga kaaway.
word.hebrew: ב  מטה-עזך--ישלח יהוה מציון    רדה בקרב איביך
word.hebrewmodern: מטה עזך ישלח יהוה מציון רדה בקרב איביך׃
word.greekot: μεγάλα τὰ ἔργα κυρίου ἐξεζητημένα εἰς πάντα τὰ θελήματα αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: The LORD is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงเป็นกำลังและบทเพลงของข้าพเจ้า พระองค์ทรงมาเป็นความรอดของข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Mi fortaleza y mi canción es JAH; Y él me ha sido por salud.
word.latinvulgate: In via testimoniorum tuorum delectatus sum, sicut in omnibus divitiis.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno è la mia forza e il mio cantico, ed è stato la mia salvezza.
word.german1912: Der HERR ist meine Macht und mein Psalm und ist mein Heil.
word.french1910: L'Eternel est ma force et le sujet de mes louanges; C'est lui qui m'a sauvé.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華是我的力量，我的詩歌；他也成了我的拯救。
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay aking kalakasan at awit; at siya'y naging aking kaligtasan.
word.maori: Ko Ihowa toku kaha, taku himene, ko ia ano toku whakaoranga.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova mao ang akong kalig-on ug ang akong alawiton; Ug siya mao ang akong kaluwasan.
word.hebrew: יד  עזי וזמרת יה    ויהי-לי לישועה
word.hebrewmodern: עזי וזמרת יה ויהי לי לישועה׃
word.greekot: ἐν τῇ ὁδῷ τῶν μαρτυρίων σου ἐτέρφθην ὡς ἐπὶ παντὶ πλούτῳ

word.kjv: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.
word.thailand: จิตใจของข้าพระองค์ละลายไปด้วยความโศก ขอทรงเสริมกำลังข้าพระองค์ตามพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Deshácese mi alma de ansiedad: Corrobórame según tu palabra.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: L’anima mia, dal dolore, si strugge in lacrime; rialzami secondo la tua parola.
word.german1912: Ich gräme mich, daß mir das Herz verschmachtet; stärke mich nach deinem Wort.
word.french1910: Mon âme pleure de chagrin: Relève-moi selon ta parole!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我因愁苦而流淚，求你照著你的話使我堅強。
word.korean: 주의 율례에서 떠나는 자는 주께서 다 멸시하셨으니 저희 궤사는 허무함이니이다
word.tagalog: Ang kaluluwa ko'y natutunaw sa kabigatan ng loob: iyong palakasin ako ayon sa iyong salita.
word.maori: ¶ E maturuturu iho ana toku wairua i te pouri: kia rite ki tau kapu tau whakau ake i ahau.
word.cebuano: Natunaw ang akong kalag tungod sa kaguol: Lig-ona ako sumala sa imong pulong.
word.hebrew: כח  דלפה נפשי מתוגה    קימני כדברך
word.hebrewmodern: דלפה נפשי מתוגה קימני כדברך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Arise, O LORD, into thy rest; thou, and the ark of thy strength.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงลุกขึ้นเสด็จไปยังที่พำนักของพระองค์ ทั้งพระองค์และหีบแห่งอานุภาพของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Levántate, oh Jehová, á tu reposo; Tú y el arca de tu fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Lèvati, o Eterno, vieni al luogo del tuo riposo, tu e l’Arca della tua forza.
word.german1912: HERR, mache dich auf zu deiner Ruhe, du und die Lade deiner Macht!
word.french1910: Lève-toi, Eternel, viens à ton lieu de repos, Toi et l'arche de ta majesté!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊，求你起來，求你和你有能力的約櫃同入安息的居所。
word.korean: 여호와여, 일어나사 주의 권능의 궤와 함께 평안한 곳으로 들어가소서
word.tagalog: Bumangon ka, Oh Panginoon, sa iyong pahingahang dako: ikaw, at ang kaban ng iyong kalakasan.
word.maori: E ara, e Ihowa, ki tou okiokinga, a koe, me te aaka o tou kaha.
word.cebuano: Tumindog ka, Oh Jehova, ngadto sa imong dapit nga pahulayanan; Ikaw, ug ang arca sa imong kalig-on.
word.hebrew: ח  קומה יהוה למנוחתך    אתה וארון עזך
word.hebrewmodern: קומה יהוה למנוחתך אתה וארון עזך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.
word.thailand: ในวันที่ข้าพระองค์ร้องทูล พระองค์ได้ทรงตอบข้าพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงเพิ่มกำลังจิตใจของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: En el día que clamé, me respondiste; Esforzásteme con fortaleza en mi alma.
word.latinvulgate: Intellexisti cogitationes meas de longe ; semitam meam et funiculum meum investigasti ;
word.italian1927: Nel giorno che ho gridato a te, tu m’hai risposto, m’hai riempito di coraggio, dando forza all’anima mia.
word.german1912: Wenn ich dich anrufe, so erhörst du mich und gibst meiner Seele große Kraft.
word.french1910: Le jour où je t'ai invoqué, tu m'as exaucé, Tu m'as rassuré, tu as fortifié mon âme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我呼求的日子，你就應允我；你使我剛強，心裡有力。
word.korean: 내가 간구하는 날에 주께서 응답하시고 내 영혼을 장려하여 강하게 하셨나이다
word.tagalog: Nang araw na ako'y tumawag ay sinagot mo ako, iyong pinatapang ako ng kalakasan sa aking kaluluwa.
word.maori: I whakahoki kupu mai koe ki ahau i te ra i karanga ai ahau: a whakahirihiritia ana e koe toku wairua ki te kaha.
word.cebuano: Sa adlaw nga ako nagsangpit, ikaw mitubag kanako, Gidasig mo ako nga adunay kaligon sa akong kalag.
word.hebrew: ג  ביום קראתי ותענני    תרהבני בנפשי עז
word.hebrewmodern: ביום קראתי ותענני תרהבני בנפשי עז׃
word.greekot: τὴν τρίβον μου καὶ τὴν σχοῖνόν μου σὺ ἐξιχνίασας καὶ πάσας τὰς ὁδούς μου προεῖδες

word.kjv: O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้าคือองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า ผู้ทรงเป็นกำลังแห่งความรอดของข้าพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงคลุมศีรษะข้าพระองค์ไว้ในยามศึก
word.spanish1909: Jehová Señor, fortaleza de mi salud, Tú pusiste á cubierto mi cabeza el día de las armas.
word.latinvulgate: Sicut crassitudo terræ erupta est super terram ; dissipata sunt ossa nostra secus infernum.
word.italian1927: O Eterno, o Signore, che sei la forza della mia salvezza, tu hai coperto il mio capo nel giorno dell’armi.
word.german1912: HERR HERR, meine starke Hilfe, du beschirmst mein Haupt zur Zeit des Streites.
word.french1910: Eternel, Seigneur, force de mon salut! Tu couvres ma tête au jour du combat.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主耶和華，拯救我的力量啊，在爭戰的日子，你保護了我的頭。
word.korean: 내 구원의 능력이신 주 여호와여, 전쟁의 날에 주께서 내 머리를 가리우셨나이다
word.tagalog: Oh Dios na Panginoon, na kalakasan ng aking kaligtasan, iyong tinakpan ang ulo ko sa kaarawan ng pagbabaka.
word.maori: E Ihowa, e te Ariki, e te kaha o toku whakaoranga, nau i hipoki toku upoko i te ra o te tatauranga.
word.cebuano: Oh Jehova nga Ginoo, ang kaligon sa akong kaluwasan, Ikaw ang nagtabon sa akong ulo sa adlaw sa gubat.
word.hebrew: ז  אמרתי ליהוה אלי אתה    האזינה יהוה קול תחנוני
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה אדני עז ישועתי סכתה לראשי ביום נשק׃
word.greekot: ὡσεὶ πάχος γῆς διερράγη ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς διεσκορπίσθη τὰ ὀστᾶ ἡμῶν παρὰ τὸν ᾅδην

word.kjv: Blessed be the LORD my strength, which teacheth my hands to war, and my fingers to fight:
word.thailand: สาธุการแด่พระเยโฮวาห์ กำลังของข้าพเจ้า ผู้ทรงฝึกมือของข้าพเจ้าให้ทำสงคราม และนิ้วมือของข้าพเจ้าให้ทำศึก
word.spanish1909: Salmo de David. BENDITO sea Jehová, mi roca, Que enseña mis manos á la batalla, Y mis dedos á la guerra:
word.latinvulgate: Laudatio ipsi David. Exaltabo te, Deus meus rex ; et benedicam nomini tuo in sæculum, et in sæculum sæculi.
word.italian1927: Salmo di Davide. Benedetto sia l’Eterno, la mia ròcca, che ammaestra le mie mani alla pugna e le mie dita alla battaglia;
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids. Gelobet sei der HERR, mein Hort, der meine Hände lehrt streiten und meine Fäuste kriegen,
word.french1910: De David. Béni soit l'Eternel, mon rocher, Qui exerce mes mains au combat, Mes doigts à la bataille,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩。耶和華我的磐石是應當稱頌的。他教導我的手作戰，訓練我的指頭打仗。（本節在《馬索拉抄本》包括細字標題）
word.korean: (다윗의 시) 나의 반석 여호와를 찬송하리로다 저가 내 손을 가르쳐 싸우게 하시며 손가락을 가르쳐 치게 하시도다
word.tagalog: Purihin ang Panginoon na aking malaking bato, na tinuturuan ang mga kamay ko na makipagdigma, at ang mga daliri ko na magsilaban:
word.maori: ¶ Na Rawiri. Kia whakapaingia a Ihowa, toku kamaka, e whakaako nei i oku ringa ki te whawhai, i oku maihao ki te tatau;
word.cebuano: Dalayegon si Jehova nga akong bato, Nga nagatudlo sa akong mga kamot sa pagpakiggubat, Ug sa akong mga tudlo sa pagpakig-away:
word.hebrew: א  לדוד  ברוך יהוה צורי--    המלמד ידי לקרב אצבעותי    למלחמה
word.hebrewmodern: לדוד ברוך יהוה צורי המלמד ידי לקרב אצבעותי למלחמה׃
word.greekot: αἴνεσις τῷ δαυιδ ὑψώσω σε ὁ θεός μου ὁ βασιλεύς μου καὶ εὐλογήσω τὸ ὄνομά σου εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα καὶ εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα τοῦ αἰῶνος

word.kjv: He delighteth not in the strength of the horse: he taketh not pleasure in the legs of a man.
word.thailand: ความปีติยินดีของพระองค์มิได้อยู่ที่กำลังของม้า ความปรีดีของพระองค์มิได้อยู่ที่ขาของมนุษย์
word.spanish1909: No toma contentamiento en la fortaleza del caballo, Ni se complace en las piernas del hombre.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Egli non si compiace della forza del cavallo, non prende piacere nelle gambe dell’uomo.
word.german1912: Er hat nicht Lust an der Stärke des Rosses noch Gefallen an eines Mannes Schenkeln.
word.french1910: Ce n'est pas dans la vigueur du cheval qu'il se complaît, Ce n'est pas dans les jambes de l'homme qu'il met son plaisir;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他喜歡的不是馬的力大，他喜悅的不是人的腿快。
word.korean: 여호와는 말의 힘을 즐거워 아니하시며 사람의 다리도 기뻐아니하시고
word.tagalog: Siya'y hindi nalulugod sa lakas ng kabayo: siya'y hindi nasasayahan sa mga paa ng tao.
word.maori: E kore ia e ahuareka ki te kaha o te hoiho: e kore ia e manako ki nga waewae o te tangata.
word.cebuano: Wala niya kahimut-i ang kusog sa kabayo: Siya walay kalipay sa mga tiil nga matulin sa tawo.
word.hebrew: י  לא בגבורת הסוס יחפץ    לא-בשוקי האיש ירצה
word.hebrewmodern: לא בגבורת הסוס יחפץ לא בשוקי האיש ירצה׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: For he hath strengthened the bars of thy gates; he hath blessed thy children within thee.
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์ทรงเสริมกำลังดาลประตูของเธอ พระองค์ทรงอำนวยพระพรบุตรทั้งหลายที่อยู่ภายในเธอ
word.spanish1909: Porque fortificó los cerrojos de tus puertas; Bendijo á tus hijos dentro de ti.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Perch’egli ha rinforzato le sbarre delle tue porte, ha benedetto i tuoi figliuoli in mezzo a te.
word.german1912: Denn er macht fest die Riegel deiner Tore und segnet deine Kinder drinnen.
word.french1910: Car il affermit les barres de tes portes, Il bénit tes fils au milieu de toi;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他堅固了你城門的門閂，賜福在你中間的兒女。
word.korean: 저가 네 문빗장을 견고히 하시고 너의 가운데 자녀에게 복을 주셨으며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't kaniyang pinatibay ang mga halang ng iyong mga pintuang-bayan; kaniyang pinagpala ang iyong mga anak sa loob mo.
word.maori: Nana nei hoki i whakakaha nga tutaki o ou tatau: manaakitia ana e ia au tamariki i roto i a koe.
word.cebuano: Kay iyang gilig-on ang mga trangka sa imong mga ganghaan; Siya nanalangin sa imong mga anak nga anaa sa sulod nimo.
word.hebrew: יג  כי-חזק בריחי שעריך    ברך בניך בקרבך
word.hebrewmodern: כי חזק בריחי שעריך ברך בניך בקרבך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Counsel is mine, and sound wisdom: I am understanding; I have strength.
word.thailand: เรามีคำหารือและสติปัญญา เรามีความเข้าใจ เรามีกำลัง
word.spanish1909: Conmigo está el consejo y el ser; Yo soy la inteligencia; mía es la fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: Meum est consilium et æquitas ; mea est prudentia, mea est fortitudo.
word.italian1927: A me appartiene il consiglio e il buon successo; io sono l’intelligenza, a me appartiene la forza.
word.german1912: Mein ist beides, Rat und Tat; ich habe Verstand und Macht.
word.french1910: Le conseil et le succès m'appartiennent; Je suis l'intelligence, la force est à moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我有才智和大智慧，我有聰明，我有能力。
word.korean: 내게는 도략과 참 지식이 있으며 나는 명철이라 내게 능력이 있으므로
word.tagalog: Payo ay akin at magaling na kaalaman: ako'y kaunawaan; ako'y may kapangyarihan,
word.maori: Ko te whakaaro tika, ko te whakaaro nui, naku; ko ahau te matauranga, kei ahau te kaha.
word.cebuano: Ang pagpakitambag maoy ako, ug kahalalum sa kahibalo: Ako mao man ang pagsabut; aduna akoy kagahum.
word.hebrew: יד  לי-עצה ותושיה    אני בינה לי גבורה
word.hebrewmodern: לי עצה ותושיה אני בינה לי גבורה׃
word.greekot: ἐμὴ βουλὴ καὶ ἀσφάλεια ἐμὴ φρόνησις ἐμὴ δὲ ἰσχύς

word.kjv: When he established the clouds above: when he strengthened the fountains of the deep:
word.thailand: เมื่อพระองค์ทรงสถาปนาฟ้าเบื้องบน เมื่อพระองค์ทรงกระทำน้ำพุของน้ำบาดาลให้มั่นไว้
word.spanish1909: Cuando afirmaba los cielos arriba, Cuando afirmaba las fuentes del abismo;
word.latinvulgate: quando æthera firmabat sursum, et librabat fontes aquarum ;
word.italian1927: quando condensava le nuvole in alto, quando rafforzava le fonti dell’abisso,
word.german1912: Da er die Wolken droben festete, da er festigte die Brunnen der Tiefe,
word.french1910: Lorsqu'il fixa les nuages en haut, Et que les sources de l'abîme jaillirent avec force,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他上使穹蒼堅固，下使深淵的水泉穩定；
word.korean: 그가 하늘을 지으시며 궁창으로 해면에 두르실 때에 내가 거기 있었고
word.tagalog: Nang kaniyang pagtibayin ang langit sa itaas: nang maging matibay ang mga bukal ng kalaliman:
word.maori: I tana whakapumautanga i nga rangi i runga; i te tototanga o nga puna o te rire;
word.cebuano: Sa diha nga gihimo niyang malig-on ang kalangitan sa kahitas-an, Sa diha nga ang mga tuboran sa kahiladman nahimong mabaskog,
word.hebrew: כח  באמצו שחקים ממעל    בעזוז עינות תהום
word.hebrewmodern: באמצו שחקים ממעל בעזוז עינות תהום׃
word.greekot: ἡνίκα ἰσχυρὰ ἐποίει τὰ ἄνω νέφη καὶ ὡς ἀσφαλεῖς ἐτίθει πηγὰς τῆς ὑπ' οὐρανὸν

word.kjv: The way of the LORD is strength to the upright: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.
word.thailand: มรรคาของพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงเป็นกำลังแก่ผู้เที่ยงธรรม แต่ผู้กระทำความชั่วช้าจะถูกทำลาย
word.spanish1909: Fortaleza es al perfecto el camino de Jehová: Mas espanto es á los que obran maldad.
word.latinvulgate: Fortitudo simplicis via Domini, et pavor his qui operantur malum.
word.italian1927: La via dell’Eterno è una fortezza per l’uomo integro, ma una rovina per gli operatori d’iniquità.
word.german1912: Der Weg des HERRN ist des Frommen Trotz; aber die Übeltäter sind blöde.
word.french1910: La voie de l'Eternel est un rempart pour l'intégrité, Mais elle est une ruine pour ceux qui font le mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的道是完全人的保障，卻是作孽的人滅亡的因由。
word.korean: 의인의 입은 지혜를 내어도 패역한 혀는 베임을 당할 것이니라
word.tagalog: Ang daan ng Panginoon ay katibayan sa matuwid; nguni't kapahamakan sa mga manggagawa ng kasamaan.
word.maori: ¶ He kaha mo te tangata tika ta Ihowa ara; he whakangaromanga ia mo nga kaimahi i te kino.
word.cebuano: Ang dalan ni Jehova maoy usa ka malig-ong salipdanan sa tawong matul-id; Apan kini maoy usa ka pagkalaglag sa mga mamumuhat sa kasal-anan.
word.hebrew: כט  מעוז לתם דרך יהוה    ומחתה לפעלי און
word.hebrewmodern: מעוז לתם דרך יהוה ומחתה לפעלי און׃
word.greekot: ὀχύρωμα ὁσίου φόβος κυρίου συντριβὴ δὲ τοῖς ἐργαζομένοις κακά

word.kjv: Where no oxen are, the crib is clean: but much increase is by the strength of the ox.
word.thailand: ที่ไหนที่ไม่มีวัวผู้ ที่นั่นรางหญ้าสะอาด แต่พืชผลอุดมได้มาด้วยแรงวัว
word.spanish1909: Sin bueyes el granero está limpio: Mas por la fuerza del buey hay abundancia de pan.
word.latinvulgate: Ubi non sunt boves præsepe vacuum est ; ubi autem plurimæ segetes, ibi manifesta est fortitudo bovis.
word.italian1927: Dove mancano i buoi è vuoto il granaio, ma l’abbondanza della raccolta sta nella forza del bove.
word.german1912: Wo nicht Ochsen sind, da ist die Krippe rein; aber wo der Ochse geschäftig ist, da ist viel Einkommen.
word.french1910: S'il n'y a pas de boeufs, la crèche est vide; C'est à la vigueur des boeufs qu'on doit l'abondance des revenus.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 沒有耕牛，槽頭乾淨；出產豐盛，卻是憑著牛的力量。
word.korean: 소가 없으면 구유는 깨끗하려니와 소의 힘으로 얻는 것이 많으니라
word.tagalog: Kung saan walang baka, ang bangan ay malinis: nguni't ang karamihan ng bunga ay nasa kalakasan ng baka.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te kahore he kau, ka ma te takotoranga kai; ma te kaha ia o te kau ka nui ai nga hua.
word.cebuano: Sa dapit diin walay mga vaca, ang pasungan mahinlo; Apan ang dakung abut pinaagi sa kusog sa vaca.
word.hebrew: ד  באין אלפים אבוס בר    ורב-תבואות בכח שור
word.hebrewmodern: באין אלפים אבוס בר ורב תבואות בכח שור׃
word.greekot: οὗ μή εἰσιν βόες φάτναι καθαραί οὗ δὲ πολλὰ γενήματα φανερὰ βοὸς ἰσχύς

word.kjv: The glory of young men is their strength: and the beauty of old men is the gray head.
word.thailand: สง่าราศีของคนหนุ่มคือกำลังของเขา แต่ความงามของคนแก่คือผมหงอกของเขา
word.spanish1909: La gloria de los jóvenes es su fortaleza, Y la hermosura de los viejos la vejez.
word.latinvulgate: Exsultatio juvenum fortitudo eorum, et dignitas senum canities.
word.italian1927: La gloria dei giovani sta nella loro forza, e la bellezza dei vecchi, nella loro canizie.
word.german1912: Der Jünglinge Stärke ist ihr Preis; und graues Haar ist der Alten Schmuck.
word.french1910: La force est la gloire des jeunes gens, Et les cheveux blancs sont l'ornement des vieillards.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 氣力是年輕人的榮耀，白髮是老年人的尊榮。
word.korean: 젊은 자의 영화는 그 힘이요 늙은 자의 아름다운 것은 백발이니라
word.tagalog: Ang kaluwalhatian ng mga binata ay ang kanilang kalakasan: at ang kagandahan ng matanda ay ang ulong may uban.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te kororia o nga taitama ko to ratou kaha: a, ko te ataahua o nga kaumatua ko te upoko hina.
word.cebuano: Ang himaya sa mga batan-ong lalake mao ang ilang kusog; Ug ang katahum sa mga tigulang mao ang ilang ubanon nga ulo.
word.hebrew: כט  תפארת בחורים כחם    והדר זקנים שיבה
word.hebrewmodern: תפארת בחורים כחם והדר זקנים שיבה׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: A wise man scaleth the city of the mighty, and casteth down the strength of the confidence thereof.
word.thailand: ปราชญ์ปีนเข้าไปในเมืองของคนที่มีกำลัง และพังทลายที่กำบังเข้มแข็งที่เขาไว้วางใจ
word.spanish1909: La ciudad de los fuertes tomó el sabio, Y derribó la fuerza en que ella confiaba.
word.latinvulgate: Civitatem fortium ascendit sapiens, et destruxit robur fiduciæ ejus.
word.italian1927: Il savio dà la scalata alla città dei forti, e abbatte il baluardo in cui essa confidava.
word.german1912: Ein Weiser gewinnt die Stadt der Starken und stürzt ihre Macht, darauf sie sich verläßt.
word.french1910: Le sage monte dans la ville des héros, Et il abat la force qui lui donnait de l'assurance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人登上勇士的城，傾覆他倚靠的堅壘。
word.korean: 지혜로운 자는 용사의 성에 올라가서 그 성의 견고히 의뢰하는 것을 파하느니라
word.tagalog: Sinasampa ng pantas ang bayan ng makapangyarihan, at ibinabagsak ang lakas ng pagkakatiwala niyaon.
word.maori: ¶ Ka pikitia e te tangata whakaaro nui te pa o nga marohirohi, ka taka hoki i a ia te kaha i whakawhirinaki ai ratou.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka manggialamon nga tawo makakatkat sa usa ka ciudad sa gamhanan, Ug makapukan sa kusog nga gisaligan niana.
word.hebrew: כב  עיר גברים עלה חכם    וירד עז מבטחה
word.hebrewmodern: עיר גברים עלה חכם וירד עז מבטחה׃
word.greekot: ὃς φυλάσσει τὸ στόμα αὐτοῦ καὶ τὴν γλῶσσαν διατηρεῖ ἐκ θλίψεως τὴν ψυχὴν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: A wise man is strong; yea, a man of knowledge increaseth strength.
word.thailand: คนฉลาดมีกำลังมาก และคนมีความรู้ก็เพิ่มกำลังขึ้น
word.spanish1909: El hombre sabio es fuerte; Y de pujante vigor el hombre docto.
word.latinvulgate: Vir sapiens fortis est, et vir doctus robustus et validus ;
word.italian1927: L’uomo savio è pien di forza, e chi ha conoscimento accresce la sua potenza;
word.german1912: Ein weiser Mann ist stark, und ein vernünftiger Mann ist mächtig von Kräften.
word.french1910: Un homme sage est plein de force, Et celui qui a de la science affermit sa vigueur;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人大有能力，有知識的人力上加力。
word.korean: 지혜 있는 자는 강하고 지식 있는 자는 힘을 더하나니
word.tagalog: Ang pantas na tao ay malakas; Oo, ang taong maalam ay lumalago ang kapangyarihan.
word.maori: He kaha te tangata whakaaro nui; ae, e whakanuia ana e te tangata mohio te kaha.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka tawo nga manggialamon kusganon man; Oo, ang usa ka tawo sa kahibalo magauswag sa kagahum.
word.hebrew: ה  גבר-חכם בעוז    ואיש-דעת מאמץ-כח
word.hebrewmodern: גבר חכם בעוז ואיש דעת מאמץ כח׃
word.greekot: κρείσσων σοφὸς ἰσχυροῦ καὶ ἀνὴρ φρόνησιν ἔχων γεωργίου μεγάλου

word.kjv: If thou faint in the day of adversity, thy strength is small.
word.thailand: ถ้าเจ้าท้อใจในวันแห่งความชั่วร้าย กำลังของเจ้าก็น้อย
word.spanish1909: Si fueres flojo en el día de trabajo, Tu fuerza será reducida.
word.latinvulgate: Si desperaveris lassus in die angustiæ, imminuetur fortitudo tua.
word.italian1927: Se ti perdi d’animo nel giorno dell’avversità, la tua forza è poca.
word.german1912: Der ist nicht stark, der in der Not nicht fest ist.
word.french1910: Si tu faiblis au jour de la détresse, Ta force n'est que détresse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你在患難的日子若是懈怠，你的力量就微小。
word.korean: 네가 만일 환난날에 낙담하면 네 힘의 미약함을 보임이니라
word.tagalog: Kung ikaw ay manglupaypay sa kaarawan ng kasakunaan, ang iyong kalakasan ay munti.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te ngoikore koe i te ra o te he, he iti tou kaha.
word.cebuano: Kong ikaw punawan sa adlaw sa kalisdanan, Ang imong kusog diyutay ra.
word.hebrew: י  התרפית ביום צרה--    צר כחכה
word.hebrewmodern: התרפית ביום צרה צר כחכה׃
word.greekot: ἐν ἡμέρᾳ κακῇ καὶ ἐν ἡμέρᾳ θλίψεως ἕως ἂν ἐκλίπῃ

word.kjv: Give not thy strength unto women, nor thy ways to that which destroyeth kings.
word.thailand: อย่าให้กำลังของเจ้าแก่ผู้หญิง อย่าให้ทางของเจ้าแก่ผู้ทำลายกษัตริย์ใดๆ
word.spanish1909: No des á las mujeres tu fuerza, Ni tus caminos á lo que es para destruir los reyes.
word.latinvulgate: Ne dederis mulieribus substantiam tuam, et divitias tuas ad delendos reges.
word.italian1927: Non dare il tuo vigore alle donne, né i tuoi costumi a quelle che perdono i re.
word.german1912: laß nicht den Weibern deine Kraft und gehe die Wege nicht, darin sich die Könige verderben!
word.french1910: Ne livre pas ta vigueur aux femmes, Et tes voies à celles qui perdent les rois.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不要把你的精力給婦女，也不要有敗壞君王的行為。
word.korean: 네 힘을 여자들에게 쓰지 말며 왕들을 멸망시키는 일을 행치 말지어다
word.tagalog: Huwag mong ibigay ang iyong kalakasan sa mga babae, o ang iyo mang mga lakad sa lumilipol ng mga hari.
word.maori: Kaua e hoatu tou kaha ki nga wahine, ou ara hoki ki te mea whakangaro o nga kingi.
word.cebuano: Ayaw pag-ihatag ang imong kusog ngadto sa mga babaye, Ni ang imong mga dalan nianang nakapalaglag sa mga hari.
word.hebrew: ג  אל-תתן לנשים חילך    ודרכיך למחות מלכין
word.hebrewmodern: אל תתן לנשים חילך ודרכיך למחות מלכין׃
word.greekot: μὴ δῷς γυναιξὶ σὸν πλοῦτον καὶ τὸν σὸν νοῦν καὶ βίον εἰς ὑστεροβουλίαν

word.kjv: She girdeth her loins with strength, and strengtheneth her arms.
word.thailand: เธอคาดเอวของเธอด้วยกำลัง และกระทำให้แขนของเธอเข้มแข็ง
word.spanish1909: Ciñó sus lomos de fortaleza, Y esforzó sus brazos.
word.latinvulgate: Accinxit fortitudine lumbos suos, et roboravit brachium suum.
word.italian1927: Ella si ricinge di forza i fianchi, e fa robuste le sue braccia.
word.german1912: Sie gürtet ihre Lenden mit Kraft und stärkt ihre Arme.
word.french1910: Elle ceint de force ses reins, Et elle affermit ses bras.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 她以能力束腰，使自己的膀臂有力。
word.korean: 힘으로 허리를 묶으며 그 팔을 강하게 하며
word.tagalog: Binibigkisan niya ang kaniyang mga balakang ng kalakasan, at nagpapalakas ng kaniyang mga bisig.
word.maori: E whitiki ana ia i tona hope ki te kaha, e mea ana i ona takakau kia pakari.
word.cebuano: Ginabaksan niya ug kalig-on ang iyang mga hawak, Ug ginapabaskog niya ang iyang mga bukton.
word.hebrew: יז  חגרה בעוז מתניה    ותאמץ זרועתיה
word.hebrewmodern: חגרה בעוז מתניה ותאמץ זרעותיה׃
word.greekot: ἀναζωσαμένη ἰσχυρῶς τὴν ὀσφὺν αὐτῆς ἤρεισεν τοὺς βραχίονας αὐτῆς εἰς ἔργον

word.kjv: Wisdom strengtheneth the wise more than ten mighty men which are in the city.
word.thailand: สติปัญญาเป็นกำลังแก่คนฉลาดดีกว่าผู้มีอำนาจใหญ่โตสิบคนที่อยู่ในเมือง
word.spanish1909: La sabiduría fortifica al sabio más que diez poderosos la ciudad en que fueron.
word.latinvulgate: Bonum est te sustentare justum : sed et ab illo ne subtrahas manum tuam ; quia qui timet Deum nihil negligit.
word.italian1927: La sapienza dà al savio più forza che non facciano dieci capi in una città.
word.german1912: Die Weisheit stärkt den Weisen mehr denn zehn Gewaltige, die in der Stadt sind.
word.french1910: La sagesse rend le sage plus fort que dix chefs qui sont dans une ville.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧使智慧人比城中十個官長更有能力。
word.korean: 지혜가 지혜자로 성읍 가운데 열 유사보다 능력이 있게 하느니라
word.tagalog: Karunungan ay kalakasan sa pantas, na higit kay sa sangpung pinuno na nangasa bayan.
word.maori: Ko te whakaaro nui rahi ake tona kaha mo te tangata whakaaro i to nga rangatira kotahi tekau i roto i te pa.
word.cebuano: Ang kaalam mao ang kusog alang sa tawong manggialamon labi kay sa napulo ka mga punoan nga anaa sa usa ka ciudad.
word.hebrew: יט החכמה תעז לחכם--מעשרה שליטים אשר היו בעיר
word.hebrewmodern: החכמה תעז לחכם מעשרה שליטים אשר היו בעיר׃
word.greekot: ἡ σοφία βοηθήσει τῷ σοφῷ ὑπὲρ δέκα ἐξουσιάζοντας τοὺς ὄντας ἐν τῇ πόλει

word.kjv: Then said I, Wisdom is better than strength: nevertheless the poor man's wisdom is despised, and his words are not heard.
word.thailand: แต่ข้าพเจ้าว่า สติปัญญาก็ดีกว่ากำลังวังชา ถึงสติปัญญาของชายยากจนคนนั้นถูกดูแคลน และถ้อยคำของเขาไม่มีใครฟังก็ตามที
word.spanish1909: Entonces dije yo: Mejor es la sabiduría que la fortaleza; aunque la ciencia del pobre sea menospreciada, y no sean escuchadas sus palabras.
word.latinvulgate: Et dicebam ego meliorem esse sapientiam fortitudine. Quomodo ergo sapientia pauperis contempta est, et verba ejus non sunt audita ?
word.italian1927: Allora io dissi: "La sapienza val meglio della forza; ma la sapienza del povero è disprezzata, e le sue parole non sono ascoltate".
word.german1912: Da sprach ich: "Weisheit ist ja besser den Stärke; doch wird des Armen Weisheit verachtet und seinen Worten nicht gehorcht."
word.french1910: Et j'ai dit: La sagesse vaut mieux que la force. Cependant la sagesse du pauvre est méprisée, et ses paroles ne sont pas écoutées.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是我說：“智慧勝過武力”，但是那個窮人的智慧被藐視，他的話也沒有人聽從。
word.korean: 그러므로 내가 이르기를 지혜가 힘보다 낫다마는 가난한 자의 지혜가 멸시를 받고 그 말이 신청되지 아니한다 하였노라
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y sinabi ko, Karunungan ay maigi kay sa kalakasan: gayon ma'y karunungan ng dukhang taong yaon ay hinamak, at ang kaniyang mga salita ay hindi dinidinig.
word.maori: Na ko taku kianga ake, Engari rawa te whakaaro nui i te kaha: heoi whakahaweatia iho nga whakaaro nui o te rawakore, kihai hoki ana kupu i whakarangona.
word.cebuano: Unya miingon ako: Ang kaalam labi pang maayo kay sa kusog: bisan pa niana ang kaalam sa tawong kabus ginatamay, ug ang iyang mga pulong wala pagpatalinghugi.
word.hebrew: טז ואמרתי אני טובה חכמה מגבורה וחכמת המסכן בזויה ודבריו אינם נשמעים
word.hebrewmodern: ואמרתי אני טובה חכמה מגבורה וחכמת המסכן בזויה ודבריו אינם נשמעים׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπα ἐγώ ἀγαθὴ σοφία ὑπὲρ δύναμιν καὶ σοφία τοῦ πένητος ἐξουδενωμένη καὶ λόγοι αὐτοῦ οὔκ εἰσιν ἀκουόμενοι

word.kjv: If the iron be blunt, and he do not whet the edge, then must he put to more strength: but wisdom is profitable to direct.
word.thailand: ถ้าขวานทื่อแล้ว และเขาไม่ลับให้คม เขาก็ต้องออกแรงมากกว่า แต่สติปัญญาจะช่วยให้บรรลุความสำเร็จ
word.spanish1909: Si se embotare el hierro, y su filo no fuere amolado, hay que añadir entonces más fuerza: empero excede la bondad de la sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Si retusum fuerit ferrum, et hoc non ut prius, sed hebetatum fuerit, multo labore exacuetur, et post industriam sequetur sapientia.
word.italian1927: Se il ferro perde il taglio e uno non l’arrota, bisogna che raddoppi la forza; ma la sapienza ha il vantaggio di sempre riuscire.
word.german1912: Wenn ein Eisen stumpf wird und an der Schneide ungeschliffen bleibt, muß man's mit Macht wieder schärfen; also folgt auch Weisheit dem Fleiß.
word.french1910: S'il a émoussé le fer, et s'il n'en a pas aiguisé le tranchant, il devra redoubler de force; mais la sagesse a l'avantage du succès.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 斧頭若鈍了，還不把斧刃磨快，就必多費力氣；智慧的好處在於助人成功。
word.korean: 무딘 철 연장 날을 갈지 아니하면 힘이 더 드느니라 오직 지혜는 성공하기에 유익하니라
word.tagalog: Kung ang bakal ay pumurol, at hindi ihasa ninoman ang talim, marapat nga niyang gamitan ng lalong kalakasan: nguni't ang karunungan ay pinakikinabangang magturo.
word.maori: Ki te puhuki te rino, a kahore e whakakoia te mata, kia nui ake ano tona kaha; he pai ia nga whakaaro nui hei whakatikatika.
word.cebuano: Kong ang puthaw mapilong, ug walay usa nga mobaid sa sulab, nan kinahanglan nga iyang pangusgan pag-ayo ang paggamit niini : aapan ang kaalam mapuslanon alang sa pagmando.
word.hebrew: י אם קהה הברזל והוא לא פנים קלקל וחילים יגבר ויתרון הכשיר חכמה
word.hebrewmodern: אם קהה הברזל והוא לא פנים קלקל וחילים יגבר ויתרון הכשיר חכמה׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν ἐκπέσῃ τὸ σιδήριον καὶ αὐτὸς πρόσωπον ἐτάραξεν καὶ δυνάμεις δυναμώσει καὶ περισσεία τοῦ ἀνδρείου σοφία

word.kjv: Blessed art thou, O land, when thy king is the son of nobles, and thy princes eat in due season, for strength, and not for drunkenness!
word.thailand: โอ บ้านเมืองเอ๋ย ความสำราญจะมีแก่เจ้า เมื่อกษัตริย์ของเจ้าเป็นบุตรชายของขุนนาง และเจ้านายของเจ้ามีการเลี้ยงตามกาละเทศะ เพื่อจะมีกำลังวังชา มิใช่จะดื่มให้มึนเมา
word.spanish1909: Bienaventurada, tú, tierra, cuando tu rey es hijo de nobles, y tus príncipes comen á su hora, por refección, y no por el beber!
word.latinvulgate: Beata terra cujus rex nobilis est, et cujus principes vescuntur in tempore suo, ad reficiendum, et non ad luxuriam.
word.italian1927: Beato te, o paese, il cui re è di nobile lignaggio, ed i cui principi si mettono a tavola al tempo convenevole, per ristorare le forze e non per ubriacarsi!
word.german1912: Wohl dir, Land, dessen König edel ist, und dessen Fürsten zu rechter Zeit speisen, zur Stärke und nicht zur Lust! {~}
word.french1910: Heureux toi, pays dont le roi est de race illustre, et dont les princes mangent au temps convenable, pour soutenir leurs forces, et non pour se livrer à la boisson!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 邦國啊，如果你的王是貴冑之子，而你的大臣又按時吃喝，為要得力，不為醉酒，你就有福了。
word.korean: 왕은 귀족의 아들이요 대신들은 취하려 함이 아니라 기력을 보하려고 마땅한 때에 먹는 이 나라여 복이 있도다
word.tagalog: Mapalad ka, Oh lupain, kung ang iyong hari ay anak ng mga mahal na tao, at ang iyong mga pangulo ay nagsisikain sa kaukulang panahon, sa ikalalakas, at hindi sa paglalasing!
word.maori: Ka hari koe, e te whenua, he tamaiti nei no nga rangatira tou kingi, a e kai ana ou rangatira i te wa e tika ai, hei mea whakakaha, ehara i te mea hei whakahaurangi.
word.cebuano: Bulahan ikaw, Oh yuta, kong ang imong hari maoy anak nga lalake sa mga tawong halangdon, ug ang imong mga principe makakaon sa angayng panahon, alang sa pagpabaskog, ug dili sa paghubog!
word.hebrew: יז אשריך ארץ שמלכך בן חורים ושריך בעת יאכלו בגבורה ולא בשתי
word.hebrewmodern: אשריך ארץ שמלכך בן חורים ושריך בעת יאכלו בגבורה ולא בשתי׃
word.greekot: μακαρία σύ γῆ ἧς ὁ βασιλεύς σου υἱὸς ἐλευθέρων καὶ οἱ ἄρχοντές σου πρὸς καιρὸν φάγονται ἐν δυνάμει καὶ οὐκ αἰσχυνθήσονται

word.kjv: Woe unto them that are mighty to drink wine, and men of strength to mingle strong drink:
word.thailand: วิบัติแก่คนเหล่านั้นที่เป็นวีรชนในการดื่มเหล้าองุ่น และเป็นคนแกล้วกล้าในการประสมเมรัย
word.spanish1909: Ay de los que son valientes para beber vino, y hombres fuertes para mezclar bebida;
word.latinvulgate: Væ qui potentes estis ad bibendum vinum, et viri fortes ad miscendam ebrietatem !
word.italian1927: Guai a quelli che son prodi nel bevere il vino, e valorosi nel mescolar le bevande alcooliche;
word.german1912: Weh denen, die Helden sind, Wein zu saufen, und Krieger in Völlerei;
word.french1910: Malheur à ceux qui ont de la bravoure pour boire du vin, Et de la vaillance pour mêler des liqueurs fortes;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那些勇於喝酒，又精於調和濃酒的人，有禍了！
word.korean: 포도주를 마시기에 용감하며 독주를 빚기에 유력한 그들은 화 있을진저
word.tagalog: Sa aba nila na malakas uminom ng alak, at mga taong malakas sa paghahalo ng matapang na inumin:
word.maori: Aue te mate mo te hunga kaha ki te inu waina, he hunga uaua ano ki te whakaranu i te wai kaha:
word.cebuano: Alaut niadtong makusog nga moinum sa vino, ug mga tawo nga kusganon sa pagsakot sa maisug nga ilimnon;
word.hebrew: כב הוי גבורים לשתות יין ואנשי חיל למסך שכר
word.hebrewmodern: הוי גבורים לשתות יין ואנשי חיל למסך שכר׃
word.greekot: οὐαὶ οἱ ἰσχύοντες ὑμῶν οἱ τὸν οἶνον πίνοντες καὶ οἱ δυνάσται οἱ κεραννύντες τὸ σικερα

word.kjv: For he saith, By the strength of my hand I have done it, and by my wisdom; for I am prudent: and I have removed the bounds of the people, and have robbed their treasures, and I have put down the inhabitants like a valiant man:
word.thailand: เพราะเขาว่า "ข้าได้กระทำการนี้ด้วยกำลังมือของข้า และด้วยสติปัญญาของข้า เพราะข้ามีความเข้าใจ ข้าได้รื้อเขตแดนของชนชาติทั้งหลาย และได้ปล้นทรัพย์สมบัติของเขา ข้าได้โยนบรรดาชาวเมืองลงมาอย่างคนกล้าหาญ
word.spanish1909: Porque dijo: Con la fortaleza de mi mano lo he hecho, y con mi sabiduría; porque he sido prudente: y quité los términos de los pueblos, y saqué sus tesoros, y derribé como valientes los que estaban sentados:
word.latinvulgate: Dixit enim : In fortitudine manus meæ feci, et in sapientia mea intellexi ; et abstuli terminos populorum, et principes eorum deprædatus sum, et detraxi quasi potens in sublimi residentes.
word.italian1927: Poich’egli dice: "Io l’ho fatto per la forza della mia mano, e per la mia sapienza, perché sono intelligente; ho rimosso i confini de’ popoli, ho predato i loro tesori; e, potente come sono, ho detronizzato dei re,
word.german1912: darum daß er spricht: Ich habe es durch meiner Hände Kraft ausgerichtet und durch meine Weisheit, denn ich bin klug; ich habe die Länder anders geteilt und ihr Einkommen geraubt und wie ein Mächtiger die Einwohner zu Boden geworfen, {~}
word.french1910: Car il dit: C'est par la force de ma main que j'ai agi, C'est par ma sagesse, car je suis intelligent; J'ai reculé les limites des peuples, et pillé leurs trésors, Et, comme un héros, j'ai renversé ceux qui siégeaient sur des trônes;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他說：“我靠著我手的能力和我的智慧行事，因為我很聰明；我挪移了列國的地界，搶奪了他們積蓄的財寶，並且我像個勇士般使他們的居民全都俯伏下來。
word.korean: 그의 말에 나는 내 손의 힘과 내 지혜로 이 일을 행하였나니 나는 총명한 자라 열국의 경계를 옮겼고 그 재물을 약탈하였으며 또 용감한 자 같이 위에 거한 자를 낮추었으며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't kaniyang sinabi, Aking ginawa ito sa kalakasan ng aking kamay at sa aking karunungan; sapagka't ako'y mabait: at aking binago ang mga hangganan ng mga tao, at ninakaw ko ang kanilang mga kayamanan, at parang matapang na lalake na ibinaba ko silang nangakaupo sa mga luklukan:
word.maori: Kua ki na hoki ia, Na te kaha o toku ringa i oti ai tenei i ahau, na toku whakaaro nui; he tangata whai mahara hoki ahau: kua whakanekehia hoki e ahau nga rohe o nga iwi, kua pahuatia ano e ahau o ratou taonga, a kua riro i ahau, i te marohirohi, ki raro te hunga noho o nga torona:
word.cebuano: Kay siya miingon: Tungod sa kusog sa akong kamot nahimo nako kini, ug tungod sa akong kaalam; kay ako adunay pagsabut: ug akong nakuha ang mga utlanan sa mga katawohan, ug natulis nako ang ilang mga bahandi, ug sama sa usa ka lalake nga maisug gipakamang ko sila nga nanaglingkod sa mga trono :
word.hebrew: יג כי אמר בכח ידי עשיתי ובחכמתי כי נבנותי ואסיר גבולת עמים ועתידתיהם (ועתודתיהם) שושתי ואוריד כאביר יושבים
word.hebrewmodern: כי אמר בכח ידי עשיתי ובחכמתי כי נבנותי ואסיר גבולת עמים ועתידתיהם שושתי ואוריד כאביר יושבים׃
word.greekot: εἶπεν γάρ τῇ ἰσχύι ποιήσω καὶ τῇ σοφίᾳ τῆς συνέσεως ἀφελῶ ὅρια ἐθνῶν καὶ τὴν ἰσχὺν αὐτῶν προνομεύσω καὶ σείσω πόλεις κατοικουμένας

word.kjv: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the LORD JEHOVAH is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระเจ้าทรงเป็นความรอดของข้าพเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าจะวางใจและไม่กลัว เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ คือพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงเป็นกำลังและบทเพลงของข้าพเจ้า และพระองค์ทรงเป็นความรอดของข้าพเจ้าแล้ว
word.spanish1909: He aquí Dios es salud mía; aseguraréme, y no temeré; porque mi fortaleza y mi canción es JAH Jehová, el cual ha sido salud para mí.
word.latinvulgate: Ecce Deus salvator meus ; fiducialiter agam, et non timebo : quia fortitudo mea et laus mea Dominus, et factus est mihi in salutem.
word.italian1927: Ecco, Iddio è la mia salvezza, io avrò fiducia, e non avrò paura di nulla; poiché l’Eterno, l’Eterno è la mia forza ed il mio cantico, ed egli è stato la mia salvezza".
word.german1912: Siehe, Gott ist mein Heil, ich bin sicher und fürchte mich nicht; denn Gott der HERR ist meine Stärke und mein Psalm und ist mein Heil.
word.french1910: Voici, Dieu est ma délivrance, Je serai plein de confiance, et je ne craindrai rien; Car l'Eternel, l'Eternel est ma force et le sujet de mes louanges; C'est lui qui m'a sauvé.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 看哪！　神是我的拯救；我要倚靠他，並不懼怕，因為耶和華　神是我的力量，我的詩歌，他也成了我的拯救。”
word.korean: 보라 하나님은 나의 구원이시라 내가 의뢰하고 두려움이 없으리니 주 여호와는 나의 힘이시며 나의 노래시며 나의 구원이심이라
word.tagalog: Narito, Dios ay aking kaligtasan; ako'y titiwala, at hindi ako matatakot: sapagka't ang Panginoon si Jehova ay aking kalakasan at awit; at siya'y naging aking kaligtasan.
word.maori: Nana, ko te Atua toku whakaoranga; ka whakawhirinaki ahau, e kore ano e wehi; ko te Ariki hoki, ko IHOWA toku kaha, taku waiata, ko ia ano hei whakaoranga moku.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, ang Dios mao ang akong kaluwasan; ako masalig, ug dili mahadlok: kay si Jehova, bisan si Jehova, mao ang akong kusog ug ang akong alawiton; ug siya nahimong kaluwasan ko.
word.hebrew: ב הנה אל ישועתי אבטח ולא אפחד  כי עזי וזמרת יה יהוה ויהי לי לישועה
word.hebrewmodern: הנה אל ישועתי אבטח ולא אפחד כי עזי וזמרת יה יהוה ויהי לי לישועה׃
word.greekot: ἰδοὺ ὁ θεός μου σωτήρ μου κύριος πεποιθὼς ἔσομαι ἐπ' αὐτῷ καὶ σωθήσομαι ἐν αὐτῷ καὶ οὐ φοβηθήσομαι διότι ἡ δόξα μου καὶ ἡ αἴνεσίς μου κύριος καὶ ἐγένετό μοι εἰς σωτηρίαν

word.kjv: Because thou hast forgotten the God of thy salvation, and hast not been mindful of the rock of thy strength, therefore shalt thou plant pleasant plants, and shalt set it with strange slips:
word.thailand: เพราะเจ้าได้หลงลืมพระเจ้าแห่งความรอดของเจ้าเสีย และมิได้จดจำศิลาเข้มแข็งของเจ้า ฉะนั้นเจ้าจะปลูกต้นอภิรมย์ และจะปลูกกิ่งไม้ต่างชาติลง
word.spanish1909: Porque te olvidaste del Dios de tu salud, y no te acordaste de la roca de tu fortaleza; por tanto plantarás plantas hermosas, y sembrarás sarmiento extraño.
word.latinvulgate: Quia oblitus es Dei salvatoris tui, et fortis adjutoris tui non es recordata : propterea plantabis plantationem fidelem, et germen alienum seminabis ;
word.italian1927: Perché hai dimenticato l’Iddio della tua salvezza e non ti sei ricordato della ròcca della tua forza; tu ti sei fatto delle piantagioni piacevoli, e hai piantato de’ magliuoli stranieri.
word.german1912: Denn du hast vergessen des Gottes deines Heils und nicht gedacht an den Felsen deiner Stärke. Darum setzest du lustige Pflanzen und legest ausländische Reben.
word.french1910: Car tu as oublié le Dieu de ton salut, Tu ne t'es pas souvenu du rocher de ton refuge. Aussi tu as fait des plantations d'agrément, Tu as planté des ceps étrangers;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 忘記　神的結果因為你忘記了那拯救你的　神，又不記念那作你避難所的磐石，所以你雖然栽下佳美的樹秧子，種下異種的幼苗，
word.korean: 이는 네가 자기의 구원의 하나님을 잊어버리며 자기의 능력의 반석을 마음에 두지 않은 까닭이라 그러므로 네가 기뻐하는 식물을 심으며 이방의 가지도 이종하고
word.tagalog: Sapagka't iyong nilimot ang Dios ng inyong kaligtasan, at hindi mo inalaala ang malaking bato ng iyong kalakasan: kaya't nagtatanim ka ng mga maligayang pananim, at iyong ibinabaon ang punla ng iba:
word.maori: Kua wareware hoki koe ki te Atua o tou whakaoranga, a kua kahore i mahara ki te kamaka o tou kaha, mo reira ka whakatupuria e koe he mea ataahua, ka whakatokia ano ki te peka ke:
word.cebuano: Kay hikalimtan mo ang Dios sa imong kaluwasan, ug ikaw wala magatagad sa bato sa imong kusog; tungod niini nagatanum ka ug matahum nga mga tanum ug nagapugas niana sa mga binhi nga lumalangyaw.
word.hebrew: י כי שכחת אלהי ישעך וצור מעזך לא זכרת על כן תטעי נטעי נעמנים וזמרת זר תזרענו
word.hebrewmodern: כי שכחת אלהי ישעך וצור מעזך לא זכרת על כן תטעי נטעי נעמנים וזמרת זר תזרענו׃
word.greekot: διότι κατέλιπες τὸν θεὸν τὸν σωτῆρά σου καὶ κυρίου τοῦ βοηθοῦ σου οὐκ ἐμνήσθης διὰ τοῦτο φυτεύσεις φύτευμα ἄπιστον καὶ σπέρμα ἄπιστον

word.kjv: And I will clothe him with thy robe, and strengthen him with thy girdle, and I will commit thy government into his hand: and he shall be a father to the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and to the house of Judah.
word.thailand: เราจะเอาเสื้อยศของเจ้ามาสวมให้เขา และจะเอาผ้าคาดของเจ้าคาดเขาไว้ และจะมอบอำนาจปกครองของเจ้าไว้ในมือของเขา และเขาจะเป็นดังบิดาแก่ชาวเยรูซาเล็มและแก่วงศ์วานยูดาห์
word.spanish1909: Y vestirélo de tus vestiduras, y le fortaleceré con tu talabarte, y entregaré en sus manos tu potestad; y será padre al morador de Jerusalem, y á la casa de Judá.
word.latinvulgate: et induam illum tunica tua, et cingulo tuo confortabo eum, et potestatem tuam dabo in manu ejus ; et erit quasi pater habitantibus Jerusalem et domui Juda.
word.italian1927: lo vestirò della tua tunica, lo ricingerò della tua cintura, rimetterò la tua autorità nelle sue mani; ed egli sarà un padre per gli abitanti di Gerusalemme e per la casa di Giuda.
word.german1912: und will ihm deinen Rock anziehen und ihn mit deinem Gürtel gürten und deine Gewalt in seine Hand geben, daß er Vater sei derer, die zu Jerusalem wohnen und des Hauses Juda.
