word.kjv: So the king of the north shall come, and cast up a mount, and take the most fenced cities: and the arms of the south shall not withstand, neither his chosen people, neither shall there be any strength to withstand.
word.thailand: แล้วกษัตริย์แห่งถิ่นเหนือจะมาล้อมและก่อเชิงเทิน และยึดเมืองที่มีป้อมแข็งแรงได้ และกำลังกองทัพของถิ่นใต้จะสู้ไม่ไหว แม้ว่ากองทัพที่คัดเลือกแล้วก็ยังสู้ไม่ได้ เพราะไม่มีกำลังที่จะยืนหยัดอยู่ได้
word.spanish1909: Vendrá pues el rey del norte, y fundará baluartes, y tomará la ciudad fuerte; y los brazos del mediodía no podrán permanecer, ni su pueblo escogido, ni habrá fortaleza que pueda resistir.
word.latinvulgate: Et venit rex aquilonis, et comportabit aggerem, et capiet urbes munitissimas : et brachia austri non sustinebunt, et consurgent electi ejus ad resistendum, et non erit fortitudo.
word.italian1927: E il re del settentrione verrà; innalzerà de’ bastioni, e s’impadronirà di una città fortificata; e né le forze del mezzogiorno, né le truppe scelte avran la forza di resistere.
word.german1912: Also wird der König gegen Mitternacht daherziehen und einen Wall aufschütten und eine feste Stadt gewinnen; und die Mittagsheere werden's nicht können wehren, und sein bestes Volk wird nicht können widerstehen;
word.french1910: Le roi du septentrion s'avancera, il élèvera des terrasses, et s'emparera des villes fortes. Les troupes du midi et l'élite du roi ne résisteront pas, elles manqueront de force pour résister.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 北方王必來，堆土築壘攻取堅固城。南方的軍力必抵擋不住，甚至精銳的部隊也無力抵抗。
word.korean: 이에 북방 왕은 와서 토성을 쌓고 견고한 성읍을 취할 것이요 남방 군대는 그를 당할 힘이 없을 것이므로
word.tagalog: Sa gayo'y paroroon ang hari sa hilagaan, at gagawa ng isang bunton, at sasakop ng isang bayan na nakukutaang mabuti: at ang pulutong ng timugan ay hindi makatatayo ni ang kaniya mang piling bayan, ni magtataglay man sila ng anomang kalakasan, upang tumayo.
word.maori: Heoi ka haere mai te kingi o te raki; ka haupuria ake ano he pukepuke e ia, a ka riro i a ia te pa he nui rawa nei te taiepa: e kore ano nga ringa o te tonga e u, e kore ano tana iwi i whiriwhiri ai, kahore he kaha e u ai.
word.cebuano: Busa ang hari sa amihanan moanha, ug magapabungdo sa yuta alang sa gubat, ug agawon ang usa ka ciudad nga labing maayong pagkakuta: ug ang kasundalohan sa habagatan dili makasukol, ni ang iyang mga piniling tawo, ni may kusog sila nga ikaasdang.
word.hebrew: טו ויבא מלך הצפון וישפך סוללה ולכד עיר מבצרות וזרעות הנגב לא יעמדו ועם מבחריו ואין כח לעמד
word.hebrewmodern: ויבא מלך הצפון וישפך סוללה ולכד עיר מבצרות וזרעות הנגב לא יעמדו ועם מבחריו ואין כח לעמד׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπελεύσεται βασιλεὺς βορρᾶ καὶ ἐπιστρέψει τὰ δόρατα αὐτοῦ καὶ λήψεται τὴν πόλιν τὴν ὀχυράν καὶ οἱ βραχίονες βασιλέως αἰγύπτου στήσονται μετὰ τῶν δυναστῶν αὐτοῦ καὶ οὐκ ἔσται αὐτῷ ἰσχὺς εἰς τὸ ἀντιστῆναι αὐτῷ

word.kjv: He shall also set his face to enter with the strength of his whole kingdom, and upright ones with him; thus shall he do: and he shall give him the daughter of women, corrupting her: but she shall not stand on his side, neither be for him.
word.thailand: ท่านจะมุ่งหน้ามาด้วยกำลังทั้งหมดแห่งราชอาณาจักร และท่านจะนำคนเที่ยงตรงไปด้วย แล้วท่านจะกระทำดังนี้ คือท่านจะยกธิดาของพวกผู้หญิงให้กษัตริย์แห่งถิ่นใต้เพื่อให้ทำลายเธอ แต่เธอจะไม่มั่นคงและอำนวยประโยชน์แก่ท่านแต่ประการใด
word.spanish1909: Pondrá luego su rostro para venir con el poder de todo su reino; y hará con aquél cosas rectas, y darále una hija de mujeres para trastornarla: mas no estará ni será por él.
word.latinvulgate: Et ponet faciem suam ut veniat ad tenendum universum regnum ejus, et recta faciet cum eo : et filiam feminarum dabit ei, ut evertat illud : et non stabit, nec illius erit.
word.italian1927: Egli si proporrà di venire con le forze di tutto il suo regno, ma farà un accomodamento col re del mezzogiorno; e gli darà la figliuola per distruggergli il regno; ma il piano non riuscirà, e il paese non gli apparterrà.
word.german1912: Und wird sein Angesicht richten, daß er mit der Macht seines ganzen Königreichs komme. Aber er wird sich mit ihm vertragen und wird ihm seine Tochter zum Weibe geben, daß er ihn verderbe; aber es wird ihm nicht geraten und wird nichts daraus werden.
word.french1910: Il se proposera d'arriver avec toutes les forces de son royaume, et de conclure la paix avec le roi du midi; il lui donnera sa fille pour femme, dans l'intention d'amener sa ruine; mais cela n'aura pas lieu, et ne lui réussira pas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他決意傾全國的力量而來，但他先和南方王修好，把自己的女兒給南方王為妻，好毀滅南國；可是他的計劃沒有成功，他自己也得不到甚麼好處。
word.korean: 그가 결심하고 전국의 힘을 다하여 이르렀다가 그와 화친할 것이요 또 여자의 딸을 그에게 주어 그 나라를 패망케 하려 할 것이나 이루지 못하리니 그에게 무익하리라
word.tagalog: At kaniyang itatanaw ang kaniyang mukha upang pumaroon na kasama ng lakas ng kaniyang buong kaharian, at ng mga tapat na kasama niya; at siya'y gagawa ng mga yaon: at ibibigay niya sa kaniya ang anak na babae ng mga babae, upang hamakin; nguni't siya'y hindi tatayo, ni siya'y mapapasa kaniya man.
word.maori: Ka anga ano tona mata, ka mea kia haere mai ia i runga i te kaha o tona kingitanga katoa, me te hunga tika ano hei hoa mona; na ka mahi ia i tana e pai ai: ka homai ano e ia ki a ia te tamahine a nga wahine, hei takakino mana: otiia e kore tera e tu, e kore hoki e mahi mona.
word.cebuano: Iyang ipatumong ang iyang nawong sa pagsulong uban ang kusog sa tibook niyang gingharian, ug ang kahimtang sa matarung nga mga salabutan diha kaniya; ug kini buhaton niya: ug iyang ihatag kaniya ang anak sa mga babaye, aron sa paglaglag kaniya: apan siya dili makadaug, ni mahamuot siya kaniya.
word.hebrew: יז וישם פניו לבוא בתקף כל מלכותו וישרים עמו--ועשה ובת הנשים יתן לו להשחיתה ולא תעמד ולא לו תהיה
word.hebrewmodern: וישם פניו לבוא בתקף כל מלכותו וישרים עמו ועשה ובת הנשים יתן לו להשחיתה ולא תעמד ולא לו תהיה׃
word.greekot: καὶ δώσει τὸ πρόσωπον αὐτοῦ ἐπελθεῖν βίᾳ πᾶν τὸ ἔργον αὐτοῦ καὶ συνθήκας μετ' αὐτοῦ ποιήσεται καὶ θυγατέρα ἀνθρώπου δώσει αὐτῷ εἰς τὸ φθεῖραι αὐτήν καὶ οὐ πείσεται καὶ οὐκ ἔσται

word.kjv: And arms shall stand on his part, and they shall pollute the sanctuary of strength, and shall take away the daily sacrifice, and they shall place the abomination that maketh desolate.
word.thailand: และกองทัพจะยืนหยัดอยู่ฝ่ายเขา พวกเขาจะกระทำให้สถานบริสุทธิ์แห่งพลกำลังเป็นมลทิน และจะให้เลิกเครื่องเผาบูชาประจำวันนั้นเสีย และเขาทั้งหลายจะตั้งสิ่งที่น่าสะอิดสะเอียนซึ่งกระทำให้เกิดการรกร้างว่างเปล่าขึ้น
word.spanish1909: Y serán puestos brazos de su parte; y contaminarán el santuario de fortaleza, y quitarán el continuo sacrificio, y pondrán la abominación espantosa.
word.latinvulgate: Et brachia ex eo stabunt, et polluent sanctuarium fortitudinis, et auferent juge sacrificium : et dabunt abominationem in desolationem.
word.italian1927: Delle forze mandate da lui si presenteranno e profaneranno il santuario, la fortezza, sopprimeranno il sacrifizio continuo, e vi collocheranno l’abominazione, che cagiona la desolazione.
word.german1912: Und es werden seine Heere daselbst stehen; die werden das Heiligtum in der Feste entweihen und das tägliche Opfer abtun und einen Greuel der Verwüstung aufrichten.
word.french1910: Des troupes se présenteront sur son ordre; elles profaneront le sanctuaire, la forteresse, elles feront cesser le sacrifice perpétuel, et dresseront l'abomination du dévastateur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的軍隊必起來，褻瀆聖殿，就是那堡壘，廢除常獻祭，又在殿裡設立了那使地荒涼的可憎的像。
word.korean: 군대는 그의 편에 서서 성소 곧 견고한 곳을 더럽히며 매일 드리는 제사를 폐하며 멸망케 하는 미운 물건을 세울 것이며
word.tagalog: At mga pulutong ay magsisitayo sa kaniyang bahagi, at kanilang lalapastanganin ang santuario, sa makatuwid baga'y ang kuta, at aalisin ang palaging handog na susunugin, at kanilang ilalagay ang kasuklamsuklam na naninira.
word.maori: Ka ara ano etahi ringa hei whakauru mona, a ka whakapokea te wahi tapu, ara te wahi kaha, ka whakakahoretia ano e ratou te patunga tapu, te mea tuturu, ka tu ano i a ratou te mea whakarihariha, te mea whakangaro.
word.cebuano: Ug ang sangkap nga kasundalohan motindog sa iyang bahin, ug pagahugawan nila ang balaang puloy-anan, bisan pa ang kuta, ug kuhaon niya ang mapadayonon nga halad-nga-sinunog , ug pagabangonon nila ang dulumtanan nga makapahimong biniyaan.
word.hebrew: לא וזרעים ממנו יעמדו וחללו המקדש המעוז והסירו התמיד ונתנו השקוץ משמם
word.hebrewmodern: וזרעים ממנו יעמדו וחללו המקדש המעוז והסירו התמיד ונתנו השקוץ משומם׃
word.greekot: καὶ βραχίονες παρ' αὐτοῦ στήσονται καὶ μιανοῦσι τὸ ἅγιον τοῦ φόβου καὶ ἀποστήσουσι τὴν θυσίαν καὶ δώσουσι βδέλυγμα ἐρημώσεως

word.kjv: Strangers have devoured his strength, and he knoweth it not: yea, gray hairs are here and there upon him, yet he knoweth not.
word.thailand: คนต่างด้าวก็กินแรงของเขา และเขาก็ไม่รู้ตัว ผมของเขาก็หงอกประปรายแล้ว และเขาก็ไม่รู้ตัว
word.spanish1909: Comieron extraños su sustancia, y él no lo supo; y aun vejez se ha esparcido por él, y él no lo entendió.
word.latinvulgate: Comederunt alieni robur ejus, et ipse nescivit ; sed et cani effusi sunt in eo, et ipse ignoravit.
word.italian1927: Degli stranieri divorano la sua forza, ed egli non vi pon mente; dei capelli bianche gli appaiono qua e là sul capo, ed egli non vi pon mente.
word.german1912: Fremde fressen seine Kraft, doch will er's nicht merken; er hat auch graue Haare gekriegt, doch will er's nicht merken.
word.french1910: Des étrangers consument sa force, Et il ne s'en doute pas; La vieillesse s'empare de lui, Et il ne s'en doute pas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 外族人吞吃了他的力量，他卻不知道；他頭上滿是白髮，他也不曉得。
word.korean: 저는 이방인에게 그 힘이 삼키웠으나 알지 못하고 백발이 얼룩 얼룩할지라도 깨닫지 못하는도다
word.tagalog: Nilamon ng mga taga ibang lupa ang kaniyang yaman, at hindi niya nalalaman: oo, mga uban ay nasasabog sa kaniya, at hindi niya nalalaman.
word.maori: Kua pau tona kaha i nga tautangata, heoi kahore ia e mohio: ina, kua wero te hina i konei, i ko ona, a kahore ia e mohio.
word.cebuano: Ang iyang kusog gilamoy sa mga dumuloong, ug siya wala magpanghibalo niana : oo, siya napuno sa mga buhok nga ubanon, ug siya wala mahibalo niana .
word.hebrew: ט אכלו זרים כחו והוא לא ידע גם שיבה זרקה בו והוא לא ידע
word.hebrewmodern: אכלו זרים כחו והוא לא ידע גם שיבה זרקה בו והוא לא ידע׃
word.greekot: κατέφαγον ἀλλότριοι τὴν ἰσχὺν αὐτοῦ αὐτὸς δὲ οὐκ ἐπέγνω καὶ πολιαὶ ἐξήνθησαν αὐτῷ καὶ αὐτὸς οὐκ ἔγνω

word.kjv: Though I have bound and strengthened their arms, yet do they imagine mischief against me.
word.thailand: แม้ว่าเราจะได้ฝึกและเพิ่มกำลังแขนให้เขา เขาก็ยังคิดทำร้ายต่อเรา
word.spanish1909: Y yo los ceñi, esforcé sus brazos, y contra mí pensaron mal.
word.latinvulgate: Et ego erudivi eos, et confortavi brachia eorum, et in me cogitaverunt malitiam.
word.italian1927: Io li ho educati, ho fortificato le loro braccia ma essi macchinano del male contro di me.
word.german1912: Ich lehre sie und stärke ihren Arm; aber sie denken Böses von mir.
word.french1910: Je les ai châtiés, j'ai fortifié leurs bras; Et ils méditent le mal contre moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我雖然鍛煉他們的手臂，使它們有力，他們卻圖謀惡計攻擊我。
word.korean: 내가 저희 팔을 연습시켜 강건케 하였으나 저희는 내게 대하여 악을 꾀하는도다
word.tagalog: Bagaman aking tinuruan at pinalakas ang kanilang mga bisig, gayon ma'y nangagisip sila ng kalikuan laban sa akin.
word.maori: Ako noa ahau, whakakaha noa i o ratou ringa, heoi kino tonu to ratou whakaaro moku.
word.cebuano: Bisan gitudloan ug gipalig-on ko ang ilang mga bukton, nagamugna hinoon sila sa mga kadautan batok kanako.
word.hebrew: טו ואני יסרתי חזקתי זרועתם ואלי יחשבו רע
word.hebrewmodern: ואני יסרתי חזקתי זרועתם ואלי יחשבו רע׃
word.greekot: κἀγὼ κατίσχυσα τοὺς βραχίονας αὐτῶν καὶ εἰς ἐμὲ ἐλογίσαντο πονηρά

word.kjv: He took his brother by the heel in the womb, and by his strength he had power with God:
word.thailand: ในครรภ์ของมารดาเขายึดส้นเท้าพี่ชายของเขา และโดยกำลังของเขาเอง เขาจึงมีอำนาจกับพระเจ้า
word.spanish1909: (H12-4) En el vientre tomó por el calcañar á su hermano, y con su fortaleza venció al ángel.
word.latinvulgate: In utero supplantavit fratrem suum, et in fortitudine sua directus est cum angelo.
word.italian1927: (H12-4) Nel seno materno egli prese il fratello per il calcagno, e, nel suo vigore, lottò con Dio;
word.german1912: (-) Er hat in Mutterleibe seinen Bruder an der Ferse gehalten, und in seiner Kraft hat er mit Gott gekämpft.
word.french1910: Dans le sein maternel Jacob saisit son frère par le talon, Et dans sa vigueur, il lutta avec Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他在母腹中抓住他哥哥的腳跟，壯年的時候又與　神角力。
word.korean: 야곱은 태에서 그 형의 발뒤꿈치를 잡았고 또 장년에 하나님과 힘을 겨루되
word.tagalog: Sa bahay-bata ay kaniyang hinawakan sa sakong ang kaniyang kapatid; at sa kaniyang kabinataan ay nagtaglay ng kapangyarihan ng Dios:
word.maori: I roto i te kopu i hopukia e ia tona tuakana ki te rekereke; a i a ia ka tangata i kaha ia ki te Atua;
word.cebuano: Sulod sa tiyan sa iyang inahan gikuha niya ang iyang igsoong lalake pinaagi sa kitin sa tiil; ug sa iyang pagkaulitawo nagamhanan siya uban sa Dios:
word.hebrew: ג וריב ליהוה עם יהודה ולפקד על יעקב כדרכיו כמעלליו ישיב לו
word.hebrewmodern: בבטן עקב את אחיו ובאונו שרה את אלהים׃
word.greekot: καὶ κρίσις τῷ κυρίῳ πρὸς ιουδαν τοῦ ἐκδικῆσαι τὸν ιακωβ κατὰ τὰς ὁδοὺς αὐτοῦ καὶ κατὰ τὰ ἐπιτηδεύματα αὐτοῦ ἀνταποδώσει αὐτῷ

word.kjv: Be not afraid, ye beasts of the field: for the pastures of the wilderness do spring, for the tree beareth her fruit, the fig tree and the vine do yield their strength.
word.thailand: เจ้าที่เป็นสัตว์ป่าเอ๋ย อย่ากลัวเลย เพราะว่าทุ่งหญ้าในถิ่นทุรกันดารนั้นเขียวสด ต้นไม้เกิดผล ต้นมะเดื่อและเถาองุ่นออกผลอย่างบริบูรณ์
word.spanish1909: Animales del campo, no temáis; porque los pastos del desierto reverdecerán, porque los árboles llevarán su fruto, la higuera y la vid darán sus frutos.
word.latinvulgate: Nolite timere, animalia regionis, quia germinaverunt speciosa deserti ; quia lignum attulit fructum suum, ficus et vinea dederunt virtutem suam.
word.italian1927: Non temete, o bestie della campagna, perché i pascoli del deserto riverdeggiano, perché gli alberi portano il loro frutto, il fico e la vite producono largamente!
word.german1912: Fürchtet euch nicht, ihr Tiere auf dem Felde; denn die Auen in der Wüste sollen grünen und die Bäume ihre Früchte bringen, und die Feigenbäume und Weinstöcke sollen wohl tragen.
word.french1910: Bêtes des champs, ne craignez pas, Car les plaines du désert reverdiront, Car les arbres porteront leurs fruits, Le figuier et la vigne donneront leurs richesses.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 田野的走獸啊，你們不要懼怕，因為曠野的草場又發青了，樹木又結果子了，無花果樹和葡萄樹也都效力了。
word.korean: 들짐승들아, 두려워 말지어다 ! 들의 풀이 싹이 나며 나무가 열매를 맺으며 무화과 나무와 포도 나무가 다 힘을 내는도다
word.tagalog: Huwag kayong mangatakot, kayong mga hayop sa parang; sapagka't ang mga pastulan sa ilang ay lumalago, sapagka't ang punong kahoy ay nagbubunga, ang puno ng higos at ang puno ng ubas ay nagbubunga.
word.maori: Kaua e wehi, e nga kararehe o te parae; ka pihi hoki nga tarutaru o te koraha, ka hua te rakau i ona hua, e tukua mai ano tona kaha e te piki, e te waina.
word.cebuano: Ayaw kahadlok, kamong mga mananap sa kapatagan; kay molangbo ang sibsibanan sa kamingawan, kay ang kahoy magadala sa iyang bunga, ang higuera, ug ang balagon sa parras managhatag sa ilang kalig-on.
word.hebrew: כב אל תיראו בהמות שדי כי דשאו נאות מדבר  כי עץ נשא פריו תאנה וגפן נתנו חילם
word.hebrewmodern: אל תיראו בהמות שדי כי דשאו נאות מדבר כי עץ נשא פריו תאנה וגפן נתנו חילם׃
word.greekot: θαρσεῖτε κτήνη τοῦ πεδίου ὅτι βεβλάστηκεν πεδία τῆς ἐρήμου ὅτι ξύλον ἤνεγκεν τὸν καρπὸν αὐτοῦ ἄμπελος καὶ συκῆ ἔδωκαν τὴν ἰσχὺν αὐτῶν

word.kjv: The LORD also shall roar out of Zion, and utter his voice from Jerusalem; and the heavens and the earth shall shake: but the LORD will be the hope of his people, and the strength of the children of Israel.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์จะทรงเปล่งพระสิงหนาทจากศิโยน ทรงเปล่งพระสุรเสียงของพระองค์จากเยรูซาเล็ม และฟ้าสวรรค์กับพิภพก็จะหวั่นไหว แต่พระเยโฮวาห์จะทรงเป็นความหวังแห่งประชาชนของพระองค์ เป็นที่กำบังเข้มแข็งของคนอิสราเอล
word.spanish1909: Y Jehová bramará desde Sión, y dará su voz desde Jerusalem, y temblarán los cielos y la tierra: mas Jehová será la esperanza de su pueblo, y la fortaleza de los hijos de Israel.
word.latinvulgate: Et Dominus de Sion rugiet, et de Jerusalem dabit vocem suam, et movebuntur cæli et terra ; et Dominus spes populi sui, et fortitudo filiorum Israël.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno ruggirà da Sion, farà risonar la sua voce da Gerusalemme, e i cieli e la terrà saranno scossi; ma l’Eterno sarà un rifugio per il suo popolo, una fortezza per i figliuoli d’Israele.
word.german1912: 4:16 Und der HERR wird aus Zion brüllen und aus Jerusalem seine Stimme lassen hören, daß Himmel und Erde beben wird. Aber der HERR wird seinem Volk eine Zuflucht sein und eine Feste den Kindern Israel.
word.french1910: De Sion l'Eternel rugit, De Jérusalem il fait entendre sa voix; Les cieux et la terre sont ébranlés. Mais l'Eternel est un refuge pour son peuple, Un abri pour les enfants d'Israël.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華從錫安吼叫，並從耶路撒冷發聲，天地就震動。耶和華卻要作他子民的避難所，作以色列眾子的保障。
word.korean: 나 여호와가 시온에서 부르짖고 예루살렘에서 목소리를 발하리니 하늘과 땅이 진동되리로다 그러나 나는 내 백성의 피난처 이스라엘 자손의 산성이 되리로다
word.tagalog: At ang Panginoo'y aangal mula sa Sion, at palalakasin ang kaniyang tinig mula sa Jerusalem; at ang langit at ang lupa ay mangayayanig: nguni't ang Panginoon ay magiging kanlungan sa kaniyang bayan, at katibayan sa mga anak ni Israel.
word.maori: A ka hamama a Ihowa i Hiona, ka puaki tona reo i Hiruharama; a ka wiri nga rangi me te whenua; otira ko Ihowa he piringa mo tona iwi, he pa kaha mo nga tama a Iharaira.
word.cebuano: Ug gikan sa Sion si Jehova mopadahunog sa iyang tingog , 7ug mosinggit sa iyang tingog gikan sa Jerusalem; ug ang mga langit ug ang yuta managpangurog: apan si Jehova mahimong dalangpanan sa iyang katawohan, ug usa ka salipdanan alang sa mga anak sa Israel.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהוה מציון ישאג ומירושלם יתן קולו ורעשו שמים וארץ ויהוה מחסה לעמו ומעוז לבני ישראל׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Therefore the flight shall perish from the swift, and the strong shall not strengthen his force, neither shall the mighty deliver himself:
word.thailand: ฉะนั้นการหนีจะประลาตไปจากผู้มีฝีเท้ารวดเร็ว คนที่แข็งแรงจะไม่สามารถเสริมกำลังของเขา คนที่มีกำลังมากจะช่วยชีวิตของตนก็ไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: Y la huída perecerá del ligero, y el fuerte no esforzará su fuerza, ni el valiente librará su vida;
word.latinvulgate: Et peribit fuga a veloce, et fortis non obtinebit virtutem suam, et robustus non salvabit animam suam :
word.italian1927: All’agile mancherà modo di darsi alla fuga, al forte non gioverà la sua forza, e il valoroso non salverà la sua vita;
word.german1912: daß der, so schnell ist, soll nicht entfliehen noch der Starke etwas vermögen und der Mächtige nicht soll sein Leben retten können;
word.french1910: Celui qui est agile ne pourra fuir, Celui qui a de la force ne pourra s'en servir, Et l'homme vaillant ne sauvera pas sa vie;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 行動迅速的不能逃走，強而有力的不能施展他的勇力，勇士也不能救自己；
word.korean: 빨리 달음박질하는 자도 도망할 수 없으며 강한 자도 자기 힘을 낼 수 없으며 용사도 피할 수 없으며
word.tagalog: At ang pagtakas ay mapapawi sa matulin; at ang malakas ay hindi makaaasa sa kaniyang kalakasan; ni ang makapangyarihan man ay makapagliligtas sa sarili;
word.maori: Na ka kore te oma i te tangata tere, e kore e nui ake te kaha o te tangata kaha, e kore hoki te marohirohi e mawhiti i te mate:
word.cebuano: Ug ang pagkalagiw mawala gikan sa tawong matulin; ug ang kusganon dili makapalig-on sa iyang kusog; ni makaluwas ang gamhanan sa iyang kaugalingon;
word.hebrew: יד ואבד מנוס מקל וחזק לא יאמץ כחו וגבור לא ימלט נפשו
word.hebrewmodern: ואבד מנוס מקל וחזק לא יאמץ כחו וגבור לא ימלט נפשו׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἀπολεῖται φυγὴ ἐκ δρομέως καὶ ὁ κραταιὸς οὐ μὴ κρατήσῃ τῆς ἰσχύος αὐτοῦ καὶ ὁ μαχητὴς οὐ μὴ σώσῃ τὴν ψυχὴν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; An adversary there shall be even round about the land; and he shall bring down thy strength from thee, and thy palaces shall be spoiled.
word.thailand: เพราะฉะนั้น องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าพระเจ้าจึงตรัสดังนี้ว่า "จะมีปฏิปักษ์ผู้หนึ่งมาล้อมแผ่นดินไว้ และเขาจะบั่นทอนขุมกำลังเสียจากเจ้า และปราสาททั้งหลายของเจ้าจะถูกปล้น"
word.spanish1909: Por tanto, el Señor Jehová ha dicho así: Un enemigo habrá aún por todos lados de la tierra, y derribará de ti tu fortaleza, y tus palacios serán saqueados.
word.latinvulgate: Propterea hæc dicit Dominus Deus : Tribulabitur et circuietur terra : et detrahetur ex te fortitudo tua, et diripientur ædes tuæ.
word.italian1927: perciò, così parla il Signore, l’Eterno: Ecco il nemico, tutt’attorno al paese; egli abbatterà la tua forza, e i tuoi palazzi saran saccheggiati.
word.german1912: Darum spricht der HERR HERR also: man wird dies Land ringsumher bedrängen und dich von deiner Macht herunterreißen und deine Häuser plündern.
word.french1910: C'est pourquoi ainsi parle le Seigneur, l'Eternel: L'ennemi investira le pays, Il détruira ta force, Et tes palais seront pillés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因此，主耶和華這樣說：“敵人必圍攻這地，使你們的勢力傾覆，搶掠你們的堡壘。”
word.korean: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 가라사대 이 땅 사면에 대적이 있어 네 힘을 쇠하게 하며 네 궁궐을 약탈하리라
word.tagalog: Kaya't ganito ang sabi ng Panginoong Dios: Kaaway ay paririto sa palibot ng lupain; at kaniyang ibabagsak ang lakas mo sa iyo, at ang iyong mga palacio ay sasamsaman.
word.maori: Mo reira ko te kupu tenei a te Ariki, a Ihowa: He hoariri tera, ka karapotia e ia te whenua: a ka riro iho i a ia tou kaha, ka pahuatia hoki ou whare kingi.
word.cebuano: Busa mao kini ang giingon sa Ginoong Jehova: Ang kabatok magalibut bisan sa tibook nga yuta; ug kuhaon niya ang imong kalig-on gikan kanimo, ug ang imong mga palacio pagatulison.
word.hebrew: יא לכן כה אמר אדני יהוה צר וסביב הארץ והוריד ממך עזך ונבזו ארמנותיך
word.hebrewmodern: לכן כה אמר אדני יהוה צר וסביב הארץ והורד ממך עזך ונבזו ארמנותיך׃
word.greekot: διὰ τοῦτο τάδε λέγει κύριος ὁ θεός τύρος κυκλόθεν ἡ γῆ σου ἐρημωθήσεται καὶ κατάξει ἐκ σοῦ ἰσχύν σου καὶ διαρπαγήσονται αἱ χῶραί σου

word.kjv: That strengtheneth the spoiled against the strong, so that the spoiled shall come against the fortress.
word.thailand: ผู้ทรงกระทำให้ผู้ที่ถูกปล้นแวบเข้าสู่ผู้แข็งแรง ผู้ที่ถูกปล้นจึงเข้าสู่ป้อมปราการ
word.spanish1909: Que da esfuerzo al despojador sobre el fuerte, y que el despojador venga contra la fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: qui subridet vastitatem super robustum, et depopulationem super potentem affert.
word.italian1927: Egli fa sorger d’improvviso la ruina sui potenti, sì ché la ruina piomba sulle fortezze.
word.german1912: der über den Starken eine Verstörung anrichtet und bringt eine Verstörung über die feste Stadt.
word.french1910: Il fait lever la ruine sur les puissants, Et la ruine vient sur les forteresses.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 是他使毀滅像閃電臨到堡壘，使毀滅臨到堅固的城。
word.korean: 저가 강한 자에게 홀연히 패망이 임하게 하신즉 그 패망이 산성에 미치느니라
word.tagalog: Yaong nagdadala ng biglang kabuwalan sa malakas, na anopa't ang pagkasira ay dumarating sa katibayan.
word.maori: Nana i whakaputa ohorere te whakangaromanga ki te hunga kaha, i tae ai te whakangaromanga ki te pa kaha.
word.cebuano: Nga nagadala sa pagkalaglag nga kalit batok sa kusgan, sa pagkaagi nga ang pagkalaglag modangat batok sa kuta.
word.hebrew: ט המבליג שד על עז ושד על מבצר יבוא
word.hebrewmodern: המבליג שד על עז ושד על מבצר יבוא׃
word.greekot: ὁ διαιρῶν συντριμμὸν ἐπ' ἰσχὺν καὶ ταλαιπωρίαν ἐπὶ ὀχύρωμα ἐπάγων

word.kjv: Ye which rejoice in a thing of nought, which say, Have we not taken to us horns by our own strength?
word.thailand: เจ้าทั้งหลายผู้เปรมปรีดิ์อยู่ในสิ่งอันไร้สาระ ผู้ซึ่งกล่าวว่า "เราได้ยึดเขาสัตว์มาเป็นของเราด้วยกำลังของเรามิใช่หรือ"
word.spanish1909: Vosotros que os alegráis en nada, que decís: ¿No nos hemos adquirido potencia con nuestra fortaleza?
word.latinvulgate: Numquid currere queunt in petris equi, aut arari potest in bubalis ? quoniam convertistis in amaritudinem judicium, et fructum justitiæ in absinthium.
word.italian1927: Voi, che vi rallegrate di cose da nulla; voi, che dite: "Non è egli con la nostra forza che abbiamo acquistato potenza?"
word.german1912: und tröstet euch des, das so gar nichts ist, und sprecht: Sind wir denn nicht stark genug mit unsern Hörnern?
word.french1910: Vous vous réjouissez de ce qui n'est que néant, Vous dites: N'est-ce pas par notre force Que nous avons acquis de la puissance?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們以奪取羅底巴為誇耀，說：“我們奪取加寧不是靠自己的力量嗎？”
word.korean: 허무한 것을 기뻐하며 이르기를 우리의 뿔은 우리 힘으로 취하지 아니하였느냐 하는 자로다
word.tagalog: Kayong nangagagalak sa isang bagay na walang kabuluhan na nangagsasabi; Di baga kami ay nagtaglay para sa amin ng mga sungay sa pamamagitan ng aming sariling kalakasan?
word.maori: E koa na hoki koutou ki te kahore noa iho, e mea na, He teka ianei kua riro mai he haona i a tatou, he mea na to tatou uaua?
word.cebuano: Kamo nga nagakalipay sa butang nga kawang lamang, nga nagaingon: Wala ba kita makakuha ug mga sungay gikan sa kaugalingon tang kusog?
word.hebrew: יג השמחים ללא דבר  האמרים--הלוא בחזקנו לקחנו לנו קרנים
word.hebrewmodern: השמחים ללא דבר האמרים הלוא בחזקנו לקחנו לנו קרנים׃
word.greekot: οἱ εὐφραινόμενοι ἐπ' οὐδενὶ λόγῳ οἱ λέγοντες οὐκ ἐν τῇ ἰσχύι ἡμῶν ἔσχομεν κέρατα

word.kjv: And he shall stand and feed in the strength of the LORD, in the majesty of the name of the LORD his God; and they shall abide: for now shall he be great unto the ends of the earth.
word.thailand: และพระองค์จะทรงยืนมั่น ทรงเลี้ยงดูด้วยพระกำลังแห่งพระเยโฮวาห์ ด้วยสง่าราศีแห่งพระนามพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของพระองค์ และเขาทั้งหลายอยู่ได้ เพราะบัดนี้พระองค์จะทรงเป็นใหญ่ตลอดจนถึงที่สุดท้ายปลายพิภพ
word.spanish1909: Y estará, y apacentará con fortaleza de Jehová, con grandeza del nombre de Jehová su Dios: y asentarán; porque ahora será engrandecido hasta los fines de la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Et stabit, et pascet in fortitudine Domini, in sublimitate nominis Domini Dei sui : et convertentur, quia nunc magnificabitur usque ad terminos terræ.
word.italian1927: (H5-3) Egli starà là e pascerà il suo gregge colla forza dell’Eterno, colla maestà del nome dell’Eterno, del suo Dio. E quelli dimoreranno in pace, perché allora ei sarà grande fino all’estremità della terra.
word.german1912: Er wird aber auftreten und weiden in der Kraft des HERRN und im Sieg des Namens des HERRN, seines Gottes. Und sie werden wohnen; denn er wird zur selben Zeit herrlich werden, soweit die Welt ist.
word.french1910: Il se présentera, et il gouvernera avec la force de l'Eternel, Avec la majesté du nom de l'Eternel, son Dieu: Et ils auront une demeure assurée, Car il sera glorifié jusqu'aux extrémités de la terre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 君王與遺民的地位與功用他必站立起來，靠著耶和華的能力，靠著耶和華他　神之名的威嚴，牧養他的羊群；他們必然安居，因為那時他必尊大，直到地極。
word.korean: 그가 여호와의 능력과 그 하나님 여호와의 이름의 위엄을 의지하고 서서 그 떼에게 먹여서 그들로 안연히 거하게 할 것이라 이제 그가 창대하여 땅 끝까지 미치리라
word.tagalog: At siya'y titindig, at magpapakain ng kaniyang kawan sa kalakasan ng Panginoon, sa kamahalan ng pangalan ng Panginoon niyang Dios: at sila'y mananatili; sapagka't ngayon siya'y magiging dakila hanggang sa mga wakas ng lupa.
word.maori: A ka tu ia, ka whangai i tana kahui i runga i te kaha o Ihowa, i runga hoki i te nui o te ingoa o Ihowa, o tona Atua; a ka noho ratou; no te mea akuareiia ka nui, ki nga pito ra ano o te whenua.
word.cebuano: Ug siya motindog, ug magapakaon sa iyang panon diha sa kusog ni Jehova, sa pagkahalangdon sa ngalan ni Jehova nga iyang Dios: ug sila magapuyo sa kasigurohan ; kay karon siya mahimong daku ngadto sa mga kinatumyan sa kalibutan.
word.hebrew: ד והיה זה שלום אשור כי יבוא בארצנו וכי ידרך בארמנותינו והקמנו עליו שבעה רעים ושמנה נסיכי אדם
word.hebrewmodern: ועמד ורעה בעז יהוה בגאון שם יהוה אלהיו וישבו כי עתה יגדל עד אפסי ארץ׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἔσται αὕτη εἰρήνη ὅταν ἀσσύριος ἐπέλθῃ ἐπὶ τὴν γῆν ὑμῶν καὶ ὅταν ἐπιβῇ ἐπὶ τὴν χώραν ὑμῶν καὶ ἐπεγερθήσονται ἐπ' αὐτὸν ἑπτὰ ποιμένες καὶ ὀκτὼ δήγματα ἀνθρώπων

word.kjv: Ethiopia and Egypt were her strength, and it was infinite; Put and Lubim were thy helpers.
word.thailand: เอธิโอเปียเป็นกำลังของเมืองนี้ทั้งอียิปต์ และก็ไม่จำกัดเสียด้วย พูตและลิบนีเป็นผู้ช่วยเมืองนั้น
word.spanish1909: Etiopía era su fortaleza, y Egipto sin límite; Put y Libia fueron en tu ayuda.
word.latinvulgate: Æthiopia fortitudo ejus, et Ægyptus, et non est finis ; Africa et Lybies fuerunt in auxilio tuo.
word.italian1927: L’Etiopia e l’Egitto eran la sua forza, e non avea limiti; Put ed i Libi erano i suoi ausiliari.
word.german1912: Mohren und Ägypten war ihre unzählige Macht, Put und Libyen waren ihre Hilfe.
word.french1910: L'Ethiopie et les Egyptiens innombrables faisaient sa force, Puth et les Libyens étaient ses auxiliaires.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 古實和埃及，是她無窮的力量，弗人和路比族，是她的助手。
word.korean: 구스와 애굽이 그 힘이 되어 한이 없었고 붓과 루빔이 그의 돕는 자가 되었으나
word.tagalog: Etiopia at Egipto ang kaniyang mga naging katibayan, at walang hanggan; Phut at Lubim ang iyong mga naging katulong.
word.maori: Ko tona kaha ko Etiopia, ko Ihipa, kahore hoki he mutunga; he awhina nou a Putu, a Rupimi.
word.cebuano: Ang Etiopia ug ang Egipto mao ang iyang kalig-on, ug kana walay kinutoban; ang Put ug ang Libia mao ang imong magtatabang.
word.hebrew: ט כוש עצמה ומצרים ואין קצה פוט ולובים היו בעזרתך
word.hebrewmodern: כוש עצמה ומצרים ואין קצה פוט ולובים היו בעזרתך׃
word.greekot: καὶ αἰθιοπία ἡ ἰσχὺς αὐτῆς καὶ αἴγυπτος καὶ οὐκ ἔστιν πέρας τῆς φυγῆς καὶ λίβυες ἐγένοντο βοηθοὶ αὐτῆς

word.kjv: Thou also shalt be drunken: thou shalt be hid, thou also shalt seek strength because of the enemy.
word.thailand: เจ้าจะมึนเมาไปด้วย เจ้าจะถูกซ่อนไว้ เจ้าจะแสวงหากำลังเพราะเหตุศัตรู
word.spanish1909: Tú también serás embriagada, serás encerrada; tú también buscarás fortaleza á causa del enemigo.
word.latinvulgate: Et tu ergo inebriaberis, et eris despecta : et tu quæres auxilium ab inimico.
word.italian1927: Tu pure sarai ubriacata, t’andrai a nascondere; tu pure cercherai un rifugio davanti al nemico.
word.german1912: Also mußt du auch trunken werden und dich verbergen und eine Feste suchen vor dem Feinde.
word.french1910: Toi aussi, tu seras enivrée, tu te cacheras; Toi aussi, tu chercheras un refuge contre l'ennemi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 至於你，你必喝醉，必被隱藏；你必因仇敵的緣故，尋找避難所。
word.korean: 너도 취한바 되어 숨으리라 너도 대적을 인하여 피난처를 찾아보리라
word.tagalog: Ikaw naman ay malalango; ikaw ay matatago; ikaw rin naman ay hahanap ng katibayan dahil sa kaaway.
word.maori: Tera ano koe ka haurangi, ka huna koe; a ka rapu koe he wahi kaha i te wehi o te hoariri.
word.cebuano: Ikaw usab mahubog: ikaw pagatagoan, ikaw usab magapangita ug dalangpanan tungod sa imong kaaway.
word.hebrew: יא גם את תשכרי תהי נעלמה גם את תבקשי מעוז מאויב
word.hebrewmodern: גם את תשכרי תהי נעלמה גם את תבקשי מעוז מאויב׃
word.greekot: καὶ σὺ μεθυσθήσῃ καὶ ἔσῃ ὑπερεωραμένη καὶ σὺ ζητήσεις σεαυτῇ στάσιν ἐξ ἐχθρῶν

word.kjv: The LORD God is my strength, and he will make my feet like hinds' feet, and he will make me to walk upon mine high places. To the chief singer on my stringed instruments.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าทรงเป็นกำลังของข้าพเจ้า พระองค์จะทรงกระทำเท้าของข้าพเจ้าเหมือนอย่างตีนกลางตัวเมีย พระองค์จะทรงกระทำให้ข้าพเจ้าเดินไปบนที่สูงทั้งหลายของข้าพเจ้า ถึงหัวหน้านักร้องใช้เครื่องสาย
word.spanish1909: Jehová el Señor es mi fortaleza, El cual pondrá mis pies como de ciervas, Y me hará andar sobre mis alturas
word.latinvulgate: Deus Dominus fortitudo mea, et ponet pedes meos quasi cervorum : et super excelsa mea deducet me victor in psalmis canentem.
word.italian1927: l’Eterno, il Signore, è la mia forza; egli renderà i miei piedi come quelli delle cerve, e mi farà camminare sui miei alti luoghi. Al Capo de Musici. Per strumenti a corda.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR ist meine Kraft und wird meine Füße machen wie Hirschfüße und wird mich auf meine Höhen führen. Vorzusingen auf meinem Saitenspiel.
word.french1910: L'Eternel, le Seigneur, est ma force; Il rend mes pieds semblables à ceux des biches, Et il me fait marcher sur mes lieux élevés. Au chef des chantres. Avec instruments à cordes.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主耶和華是我的力量，他使我的腳快如母鹿的蹄，在高地上行走。交詩班長，用絲弦的樂器伴奏。
word.korean: 주 여호와는 나의 힘이시라 ! 나의 발을 사슴과 같게 하사 나로 나의 높은 곳에 다니게 하시리로다 이 노래는 영장을 위하여 내 수금에 맞춘 것이니라
word.tagalog: Si Jehova, na Panginoon, siyang aking lakas; At ginagawa niya ang aking mga paa na gaya ng sa mga usa. At ako'y palalakarin niya sa aking mga mataas na dako. Sa Pangulong Manunugtog, sa aking mga panugtog na kawad.
word.maori: Ko Ihowa, ko toku Ariki, toku kaha, ka meinga e ia oku waewae kia rite ki o te hata, ka meinga ano ahau e ia kia takahi i runga i oku wahi tiketike. Ki te tino kaiwaiata i runga i aku mea whakatangi.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova, nga Ginoo, mao ang akong kalig-on; Ug ang akong mga tiil himoon niya nga sama sa mga tiil sa mga bayeng lagsaw, Ug palakton ako niya sa mga hatag-as nakong dapit.
word.hebrew: יט יהוה אדני חילי וישם רגלי כאילות ועל במותי ידרכני למנצח בנגינותי  {ש}
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה אדני חילי וישם רגלי כאילות ועל במותי ידרכני למנצח בנגינותי׃
word.greekot: κύριος ὁ θεὸς δύναμίς μου καὶ τάξει τοὺς πόδας μου εἰς συντέλειαν ἐπὶ τὰ ὑψηλὰ ἐπιβιβᾷ με τοῦ νικῆσαι ἐν τῇ ᾠδῇ αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: And I will overthrow the throne of kingdoms, and I will destroy the strength of the kingdoms of the heathen; and I will overthrow the chariots, and those that ride in them; and the horses and their riders shall come down, every one by the sword of his brother.
word.thailand: และเราจะคว่ำพระที่นั่งของบรรดาราชอาณาจักร เราจะทำลายเรี่ยวแรงของบรรดาราชอาณาจักรแห่งประชาชาติ และจะคว่ำรถรบกับผู้ขับขี่ ม้าและผู้ขับขี่จะต้องล้มลง คือทุกคนจะต้องล้มลงด้วยดาบแห่งพี่น้องของเขา
word.spanish1909: Y trastornaré el trono de los reinos, y destruiré la fuerza del reino de las gentes; y trastornaré el carro, y los que en él suben; y vendrán abajo los caballos, y los que en ellos montan, cada cual por la espada de su hermano.
word.latinvulgate: Loquere ad Zorobabel ducem Juda, dicens : Ego movebo cælum pariter et terram,
word.italian1927: rovescerò il trono dei regni e distruggerò la forza dei regni delle nazioni; rovescerò i carri e quelli che vi montano; i cavalli e i loro cavalieri cadranno, l’uno per la spada dell’altro.
word.german1912: und will die Stühle der Königreiche umkehren und die mächtigen Königreiche der Heiden vertilgen und will die Wagen mit ihren Reitern umkehren, daß Roß und Mann fallen sollen, ein jeglicher durch des andern Schwert.
word.french1910: Je renverserai le trône des royaumes, Je détruirai la force des royaumes des nations, Je renverserai les chars et ceux qui les montent; Les chevaux et leurs cavaliers seront abattus, L'un par l'épée de l'autre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我必傾覆列國的寶座，消滅外族萬國的勢力，我必推翻戰車和駕車的人；馬匹和騎馬的都必跌倒；各人必死在自己兄弟的刀下。’
word.korean: 열국의 보좌를 엎을 것이요 열방의 세력을 멸할 것이요 그 병거들과 그 탄 자를 엎드러뜨리리니 말과 그 탄 자가 각각 그 동무의 칼에 엎드러지리라
word.tagalog: At aking guguluhin ang luklukan ng mga kaharian, at aking gigibain ang lakas ng mga kaharian ng mga bansa; at aking guguluhin ang mga karo, at yaong nagsisisakay sa mga yaon; at ang mga kabayo at ang mga sakay ng mga yaon ay mangahuhulog, ang bawa't isa'y sa pamamagitan ng tabak ng kaniyang kapatid.
word.maori: Ka hurihia ake ano e ahau te torona o nga kingitanga, ka ngaro i ahau te kaha o nga kingitanga o nga tauiwi; ka hurihia ake e ahau nga hariata, me ona kaieke; ka riro iho ano nga hoiho me o ratou kaieke, tenei, tenei, i te hoari a tona tuakana.
word.cebuano: Ug akong pagagub-on ang trono sa mga gingharian; ug akong papalumpagon ang kusog sa mga gingharian sa mga nasud; ug akong papagubon ang mga carro, ug kadtong mga nagasakay niana; ug ang mga kabayo ug ang ilang mga magkakabayo mangahulog, ang tagsatagsa pinaagi sa espada sa iyang igsoon.
word.hebrew: כב והפכתי כסא ממלכות והשמדתי חזק ממלכות הגוים והפכתי מרכבה ורכביה וירדו סוסים ורכביהם איש בחרב אחיו
word.hebrewmodern: והפכתי כסא ממלכות והשמדתי חזק ממלכות הגוים והפכתי מרכבה ורכביה וירדו סוסים ורכביהם איש בחרב אחיו׃
word.greekot: καὶ καταστρέψω θρόνους βασιλέων καὶ ὀλεθρεύσω δύναμιν βασιλέων τῶν ἐθνῶν καὶ καταστρέψω ἅρματα καὶ ἀναβάτας καὶ καταβήσονται ἵπποι καὶ ἀναβάται αὐτῶν ἕκαστος ἐν ῥομφαίᾳ πρὸς τὸν ἀδελφὸν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: And I will strengthen the house of Judah, and I will save the house of Joseph, and I will bring them again to place them; for I have mercy upon them: and they shall be as though I had not cast them off: for I am the LORD their God, and will hear them.
word.thailand: เราจะหนุนกำลังวงศ์วานของยูดาห์ และเราจะช่วยวงศ์วานของโยเซฟให้รอด เราจะนำเขากลับมาอีกเพื่อให้เขาได้อาศัยอยู่เพราะเราสงสารเขา และเขาจะเป็นเหมือนอย่างว่าเรามิได้ทอดทิ้งเขา เพราะเราคือพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของเขา เราจะฟังเขา
word.spanish1909: Porque yo fortificaré la casa de Judá, y guardaré la casa de José; y harélos volver, porque de ellos tendré piedad; y serán como si no los hubiera desechado; porque yo soy Jehová su Dios, que los oiré.
word.latinvulgate: Et confortabo domum Juda, et domum Joseph salvabo : et convertam eos, quia miserebor eorum : et erunt sicut fuerunt quando non projeceram eos : ego enim Dominus Deus eorum, et exaudiam eos.
word.italian1927: E io fortificherò la casa di Giuda, e salverò la casa di Giuseppe, e li ricondurrò perché ho pietà di loro; e saranno come se non li avessi mai scacciati, perché io sono l’Eterno, il loro Dio, e li esaudirò.
word.german1912: Und ich will das Haus Juda stärken und das Haus Joseph erretten und will sie wieder einsetzen; denn ich erbarme mich ihrer; und sie sollen sein, wie sie waren, da ich sie nicht verstoßen hatte. Denn ich, der HERR, ihr Gott, will sie erhören.
word.french1910: Je fortifierai la maison de Juda, Et je délivrerai la maison de Joseph; Je les ramènerai, car j'ai compassion d'eux, Et ils seront comme si je ne les avais pas rejetés; Car je suis l'Eternel, leur Dieu, et je les exaucerai.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主必拯救他的子民我要使猶大家強盛起來，我必拯救約瑟家。我要使他們歸回，因為我憐憫他們；他們好像未遭我棄絕一樣，因為我是耶和華他們的　神，我必應允他們。
word.korean: 내가 유다 족속을 견고하게 하며 요셉 족속을 구원할지라 내가 그들을 긍휼히 여김으로 그들로 돌아오게 하리니 그들이 내게 내어 버리움이 없었음 같이 되리라 나는 그들의 하나님 여호와라 내가 그들을 들으리라
word.tagalog: At aking palalakasin ang sangbahayan ni Juda, at aking ililigtas ang sangbahayan ni Jose, at aking ibabalik sila uli; sapagka't ako'y naawa sa kanila; at sila'y magiging parang hindi ko itinakuwil: sapagka't ako ang Panginoon nilang Dios, at aking didinggin sila.
word.maori: Na ka kaha i ahau te whare o Hura, ka ora ano i ahau te whare o Hohepa, ka whakahokia ki te nohoanga; no te mea ka tohungia ratou e ahau, a me te mea kihai ratou i peia e ahau; ko ahau hoki, ko Ihowa, to ratou Atua, ka whakarongo ano ahau ki a ra tou.
word.cebuano: Ug akong lig-onon ang balay sa Juda, ug akong luwason ang balay ni Jose, ug akong dad-on sila pagbalik; kay ako adunay kalooy kanila; ug sila mahimong ingon sa wala ko sila isalikway; kay ako man si Jehova nga ilang Dios, ug ako magapatalinghug kanila.
word.hebrew: ו וגברתי את בית יהודה ואת בית יוסף אושיע והושבותים כי רחמתים והיו כאשר לא זנחתים  כי אני יהוה אלהיהם--ואענם
word.hebrewmodern: וגברתי את בית יהודה ואת בית יוסף אושיע והושבותים כי רחמתים והיו כאשר לא זנחתים כי אני יהוה אלהיהם ואענם׃

word.kjv: And I will strengthen them in the LORD; and they shall walk up and down in his name, saith the LORD.
word.thailand: เราจะกระทำให้เขาทั้งหลายเข้มแข็งในพระเยโฮวาห์ และเขาจะดำเนินในพระนามของพระองค์" พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสดังนี้แหละ
word.spanish1909: Y yo los fortificaré en Jehová, y caminarán en su nombre, dice Jehová.

word.italian1927: Io li renderò forti nell’Eterno, ed essi cammineranno nel suo nome, dice l’Eterno.
word.german1912: Ich will sie stärken in dem HERRN, daß sie sollen wandeln in seinem Namen, spricht der HERR.
word.french1910: Je les fortifierai par l'Eternel, Et ils marcheront en son nom, Dit l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我必使我的子民因耶和華而強盛，他們要奉耶和華的名行事為人。”這是耶和華的宣告。
word.korean: 내가 그들로 나 여호와를 의지하여 견고케 하리니 그들이 내 이름을 받들어 왕래하리라 나 여호와의 말이니라

word.maori: Ka whakakahangia ano ratou e ahau i runga i a Ihowa; ka haereere hoki ratou i runga i tona ingoa, e ai ta Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Ug sila pagalig-onon ko diha kang Jehova; ug sila magalakaw ngadto-nganhi tungod sa iyang ngalan, nagaingon si Jehova.

word.kjv: And the governors of Judah shall say in their heart, The inhabitants of Jerusalem shall be my strength in the LORD of hosts their God.

word.maori: A ka mea nga rangatira o Hura i roto i o ratou ngakau, Ko nga tangata o Hiruharama hei kaha moku i runga i to ratou Atua, i a Ihowa o nga mano.
word.cebuano: Ug ang mga pangulo sa Juda magaingon diha sa ilang kasingkasing: Ang mga pumoluyo sa Jerusalem mao ang akong kalig-on diha kang Jehova sa mga panon nga ilang Dios.

word.kjv: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind, and with all thy strength: this is the first commandment.

word.french1910: et: Tu aimeras le Seigneur, ton Dieu, de tout ton coeur, de toute ton âme, de toute ta pensée, et de toute ta force.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要全心、全性、全意、全力，愛主你的　神。’

word.kjv: And to love him with all the heart, and with all the understanding, and with all the soul, and with all the strength, and to love his neighbour as himself, is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices.

word.spanish1909: Y que amarle de todo corazón, y de todo entendimiento, y de toda el alma, y de todas las fuerzas, y amar al prójimo como á sí mismo, más es que todos los holocaustos y sacrificios.
word.latinvulgate: Et ut diligatur ex toto corde, et ex toto intellectu, et ex tota anima, et ex tota fortitudine, et diligere proximum tamquam seipsum, majus est omnibus holocautomatibus, et sacrificiis.
word.italian1927: e che amarlo con tutto il cuore, con tutto l’intelletto e con tutta la forza e amare il prossimo come te stesso, è assai più che tutti gli olocausti e i sacrifici.
word.german1912: Und ihn lieben von ganzem Herzen, von ganzem Gemüte, von ganzer Seele, und von allen Kräften, und lieben seinen Nächsten wie sich selbst, das ist mehr denn Brandopfer und alle Opfer.

word.tagalog: At ang siya'y ibigin ng buong puso, at ng buong pagkaunawa, at ng buong lakas, at ibigin ang kapuwa niya na gaya ng sa kaniyang sarili, ay higit pa kay sa lahat ng mga handog na susunugin at mga hain.

word.cebuano: Ug ang paghigugma kaniya sa bug-os nga kasingkasing, ug sa bug-os nga hunahuna, ug sa bug-os nga kalag, ug sa bug-os nga kusog; ug ang paghigugma sa isigkatawo sama sa iyang kaugalingon, labaw pa kay sa tanan tibook nga halad nga sinunog ug mga halad.
word.hebrewmodern: ולאהבה אתו בכל לבב ובכל מדע ובכל נפש ובכל מאד ולאהבה את הרע כנפשו גדולה היא מכל עלות וזבחים׃

word.kjv: For we would not, brethren, have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia, that we were pressed out of measure, above strength, insomuch that we despaired even of life:
word.thailand: พี่น้องทั้งหลาย เราอยากให้ท่านทราบถึงความทุกข์ยากที่เกิดแก่เราในแคว้นเอเชีย ซึ่งทำให้เราหนักใจจนเหลือกำลัง จนเราเกือบหมดหวังที่จะเอาชีวิตรอดมาได้
word.spanish1909: Porque hermanos, no queremos que ignoréis de nuestra tribulación que nos fué hecha en Asia; que sobremanera fuimos cargados sobre nuestras fuerzas de tal manera que estuviésemos en duda de la vida.
word.latinvulgate: Non enim volumus ignorare vos, fratres, de tribulatione nostra, quæ facta est in Asia, quoniam supra modum gravati sumus supra virtutem, ita ut tæderet nos etiam vivere.
word.italian1927: Poiché, fratelli, non vogliamo che ignoriate, circa l’afflizione che ci colse in Asia, che siamo stati oltremodo aggravati, al di là delle nostre forze, tanto che stavamo in gran dubbio anche della vita.
word.german1912: Denn wir wollen euch nicht verhalten, liebe Brüder, unsre Trübsal, die uns in Asien widerfahren ist, da wir über die Maßen beschwert waren und über Macht, also daß wir auch am Leben verzagten
word.french1910: Nous ne voulons pas, en effet, vous laisser ignorer, frères, au sujet de la tribulation qui nous est survenue en Asie, que nous avons été excessivement accablés, au delà de nos forces, de telle sorte que nous désespérions même de conserver la vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 弟兄們，我們在亞西亞遭受的患難，我們很想讓你們知道。那時我們受到了過於我們所能忍受的壓力，甚至活下去的希望都沒有了，
word.korean: 형제들아 우리가 아시아에서 당한 환난을 너희가 알지 못하기를 원치 아니하노니 힘에 지나도록 심한 고생을 받아 살 소망까지 끊어지고
word.tagalog: Hindi namin ibig na kayo'y di makaalam, mga kapatid, ng tungkol sa mga kapighatian namin na nangyari sa Asia, na kami ay totoong nabigatan, ng higit sa aming kaya, ano pa't kami ay nawalan na ng pagasa sa buhay:
word.maori: Kahore hoki matou e pai kia ngaro i a koutou, e oku teina, te paweratanga i tupono ki a matou i Ahia, te tino taimaha o te pehanga i a matou, nuku noa atu i to matou kaha, na poroporoaki ana matou ki te ora:
word.cebuano: Kay dili kami buot nga kamo dili masayud, mga igsoon, mahatungod sa mga kagul-anan, nga miabut kanamo sa Asia, nga gibug-atan kami sa hilabihan gayud, nga labaw sa among kusog, sa pagkaagi nga kami nawad-an na sa paglaum sa kinabuhi.
word.hebrewmodern: כי לא נכחד מכם אחי את צרתנו אשר מצאתנו באסיא אשר כבדה עלינו עד למאד ויותר מכחנו עד כי נואשנו מן החיים׃
word.textusreceptus: ου γαρ θελομεν υμας αγνοειν αδελφοι υπερ της θλιψεως ημων της γενομενης ημιν εν τη ασια οτι καθ υπερβολην εβαρηθημεν υπερ δυναμιν ωστε εξαπορηθηναι ημας και του ζην
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
word.thailand: แต่พระองค์ตรัสกับข้าพเจ้าว่า "พระคุณของเราก็มีพอสำหรับเจ้าแล้ว เพราะความอ่อนแอมีที่ไหน เดชของเราก็มีฤทธิ์ขึ้นเต็มขนาดที่นั่น" เหตุฉะนั้นข้าพเจ้าจึงยินดีโอ้อวดในบรรดาความอ่อนแอของข้าพเจ้า เพื่อฤทธิ์เดชของพระคริสต์จะได้อยู่ในข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Y me ha dicho: Bástate mi gracia; porque mi potencia en la flaqueza se perfecciona. Por tanto, de buena gana me gloriaré más bien en mis flaquezas, porque habite en mí la potencia de Cristo.
word.latinvulgate: et dixit mihi : Sufficit tibi gratia mea : nam virtus in infirmitate perficitur. Libenter igitur gloriabor in infirmitatibus meis, ut inhabitet in me virtus Christi.
word.italian1927: ed egli mi ha detto: La mia grazia ti basta, perché la mia potenza si dimostra perfetta nella debolezza. Perciò molto volentieri mi glorierò piuttosto delle mie debolezze, onde la potenza di Cristo riposi su me.
word.german1912: Und er hat zu mir gesagt: Laß dir an meiner Gnade genügen; denn meine Kraft ist in den Schwachen mächtig. Darum will ich mich am allerliebsten rühmen meiner Schwachheit, auf daß die Kraft Christi bei mir wohne.
word.french1910: et il m'a dit: Ma grâce te suffit, car ma puissance s'accomplit dans la faiblesse. Je me glorifierai donc bien plus volontiers de mes faiblesses, afin que la puissance de Christ repose sur moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他卻對我說：“我的恩典是夠你用的，因為我的能力在人的軟弱上顯得完全。”所以，我更喜歡誇自己的軟弱，好讓基督的能力臨到我的身上。
word.korean: 내게 이르시기를 내 은혜가 네게 족하도다 ! 이는 내 능력이 약한데서 온전하여짐이라 하신지라 이러므로 도리어 크게 기뻐함으로나의 여러 약한 것들에 대하여 자랑하리니 이는 그리스도의 능력으로 내게 머물게 하려 함이라
word.tagalog: At siya'y nagsabi sa akin, Ang aking biyaya ay sapat na sa iyo: sapagka't ang aking kapangyarihan ay nagiging sakdal sa kahinaan. Kaya't bagkus akong magmamapuri na may malaking galak sa aking kahinaan upang manahan nawa sa akin ang kapangyarihan ni Cristo.
word.maori: A kua mea mai ia ki ahau, E ranea ana toku atawhai hei mea mou: mana tonu hoki toku kaha i runga i te ngoikore. Na pai rawa atu ki ahau te whakamanamana ki oku ngoikore, kia ai ai te kaha o te Karaiti hei taupoki moku.
word.cebuano: Ug siya nagaingon kanako: Ang akong gracia igo kanimo, kay ang akong gahum ginahingpit diha sa kaluya. Busa, sa dakung kalipay palabihon ko ang paghimaya sa akong mga kaluyahon, aron magpabilin kanako ang gahum ni Cristo.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אלי די לך חסדי כי בחלשה תשלם גבורתי על כן שמח לבי להתהלל בחלשותי למען תשרה עלי גבורת המשיח׃
word.textusreceptus: και ειρηκεν μοι αρκει σοι η χαρις μου η γαρ δυναμις μου εν ασθενεια τελειουται ηδιστα ουν μαλλον καυχησομαι εν ταις ασθενειαις μου ινα επισκηνωση επ εμε η δυναμις του χριστου
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: That he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man;
word.thailand: ขอให้พระองค์ทรงโปรดประทานกำลังเรี่ยวแรงมากฝ่ายจิตใจแก่ท่าน โดยเดชพระวิญญาณของพระองค์ตามความไพบูลย์แห่งสง่าราศีของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Que os dé, conforme á las riquezas de su gloria, el ser corroborados con potencia en el hombre interior por su Espíritu.
word.latinvulgate: ut det vobis secundum divitias gloriæ suæ, virtute corroborari per Spiritum ejus in interiorem hominem,
word.italian1927: perch’Egli vi dia, secondo le ricchezze della sua gloria, d’esser potentemente fortificati mediante lo Spirito suo, nell’uomo interiore,
word.german1912: daß er euch Kraft gebe nach dem Reichtum seiner Herrlichkeit, stark zu werden durch seinen Geist an dem inwendigen Menschen,
word.french1910: afin qu'il vous donne, selon la richesse de sa gloire, d'être puissamment fortifiés par son Esprit dans l'homme intérieur,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求他按著他榮耀的豐盛，藉著他的靈，用大能使你們內在的人剛強起來，
word.korean: 그 영광의 풍성을 따라 그의 성령으로 말미암아 너희 속 사람을 능력으로 강건하게 하옵시며
word.tagalog: Upang sa inyo'y ipagkaloob niya, ayon sa mga kayamanan ng kaniyang kaluwalhatian, na kayo'y palakasin ng kapangyarihan sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang Espiritu sa pagkataong loob;
word.maori: Kia rite ki te nui rawa o tona kororia he homaitanga mana ki a koutou, kia pakari ai a roto i a koutou i te kaha o tona Wairua:
word.cebuano: Nga unta itugot niya kaninyo, sumala sa mga pagkadato sa iyang himaya, aron palig-onon kamo uban ang gahum pinaagi sa iyang Espiritu diha sa tawo nga sa sulod;
word.hebrewmodern: לתת לכם לפי עשר כבודו להתחזק בגבורה על ידי רוחו לאדם הפנימי׃
word.textusreceptus: ινα δωη υμιν κατα τον πλουτον της δοξης αυτου δυναμει κραταιωθηναι δια του πνευματος αυτου εις τον εσω ανθρωπον
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้ากระทำทุกสิ่งได้โดยพระคริสต์ผู้ทรงเสริมกำลังข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Todo lo puedo en Cristo que me fortalece.
word.latinvulgate: Omnia possum in eo qui me confortat.
word.italian1927: Io posso ogni cosa in Colui che mi fortifica.
word.german1912: Ich vermag alles durch den, der mich mächtig macht, Christus.
word.french1910: Je puis tout par celui qui me fortifie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我靠著那加給我能力的，凡事都能作。
word.korean: 내게 능력 주시는 자 안에서 내가 모든 것을 할 수 있느니라 !
word.tagalog: Lahat ng mga bagay ay aking magagawa doon sa nagpapalakas sa akin.
word.maori: Ka taea e ahau nga mea katoa i roto i a te Karaiti e whakakaha nei i ahau.
word.cebuano: Mahimo ko ang tanang mga butang diha kaniya nga nagapalig-on kanako.
word.hebrewmodern: כל זאת אוכל בעזרת המשיח הנותן כח בקרבי׃
word.textusreceptus: παντα ισχυω εν τω ενδυναμουντι με χριστω
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.
word.thailand: แต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าทรงประทับอยู่กับข้าพเจ้า และได้ทรงประทานกำลังให้ข้าพเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าจึงประกาศพระวจนะได้อย่างเต็มที่ เพื่อให้คนต่างชาติทั้งปวงได้ยิน ดังนั้นข้าพเจ้าจึงรอดพ้นจากปากสิงโตนั้น
word.spanish1909: Mas el Señor me ayudó, y me esforzó para que por mí fuese cumplida la predicación, y todos los Gentiles oyesen; y fuí librado de la boca del león.
word.latinvulgate: Dominus autem mihi astitit, et confortavit me, ut per me prædicatio impleatur, et audiant omnes gentes : et liberatus sum de ore leonis.
word.italian1927: Ma il Signore è stato meco e m’ha fortificato, affinché il Vangelo fosse per mezzo mio pienamente proclamato e tutti i Gentili l’udissero; e sono stato liberato dalla gola del leone.
word.german1912: Der HERR aber stand mir bei und stärkte mich, auf daß durch mich die Predigt bestätigt würde und alle Heiden sie hörten; und ich ward erlöst von des Löwen Rachen.
word.french1910: C'est le Seigneur qui m'a assisté et qui m'a fortifié, afin que la prédication fût accomplie par moi et que tous les païens l'entendissent. Et j'ai été délivré de la gueule du lion.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 然而主站在我旁邊，加給我力量，使福音的信息藉著我盡都傳開，萬國的人都可以聽見；他並且把我從獅子口中救出來。
word.korean: 주께서 나를 모든 악한 일에서 건져내시고 또 그의 천국에 들어 가도록 구원하시리니 그에게 영광이 세세 무궁토록 있을지어다 아멘
word.tagalog: Datapuwa't ang Panginoon ay sumaakin, at ako'y pinalakas; upang sa pamamagitan ko ang mabuting balita ay maitanyag ng ganap, at upang mapakinggan ng lahat ng mga Gentil: at ako'y iniligtas sa bibig ng leon.
word.maori: I tu ia te Ariki ki toku taha, nana hoki ahau i whakakaha; kia whakapaua rawatia ai e ahau te kauwhau, kia rongo katoa ai nga tauiwi: a toia mai ana ahau i roto i te mangai o te raiona.
word.cebuano: Apan ang Ginoo nag-uban kanako, ug nagpalig-on kanako, aron nga pinaagi kanako, ang pag-wali ikasangyaw gayud sa hingpit, ug magpakadungog ang tanang mga Gentil; ug giluwas ako gikan sa baba sa leon.
word.hebrewmodern: אבל האדון הוא עזרני וחזקני למען תשלם על ידי הבשורה וישמעוה כל הגוים ואנצל מפי אריה׃
word.textusreceptus: ο δε κυριος μοι παρεστη και ενεδυναμωσεν με ινα δι εμου το κηρυγμα πληροφορηθη και ακουση παντα τα εθνη και ερρυσθην εκ στοματος λεοντος
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: For a testament is of force after men are dead: otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth.
word.thailand: เพราะว่าเมื่อคนตายแล้วหนังสือพินัยกรรมนั้นจึงใช้ได้ มิฉะนั้นเมื่อผู้ทำยังมีชีวิตอยู่ หนังสือพินัยกรรมนั้นก็ใช้ไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: Porque el testamento con la muerte es confirmado; de otra manera no es válido entre tanto que el testador vive.
word.latinvulgate: Testamentum enim in mortuis confirmatum est : alioquin nondum valet, dum vivit qui testatus est.
word.italian1927: Perché un testamento è valido quand’è avvenuta la morte; poiché non ha valore finché vive il testatore.
word.german1912: Denn ein Testament wird fest durch den Tod; es hat noch nicht Kraft, wenn der noch lebt, der es gemacht hat.
word.french1910: Un testament, en effet, n'est valable qu'en cas de mort, puisqu'il n'a aucune force tant que le testateur vit.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為人死了，遺囑才能確立，立遺囑的人還活著的時候，遺囑決不生效。
word.korean: 유언은 그 사람이 죽은 후에야 견고한즉 유언한 자가 살았을 때에는 언제든지 효력이 없느니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang isang tipan ay may kabuluhan kung mamatay ang gumawa: sa ibang paraa'y walang anomang kabuluhan samantalang nabubuhay ang gumawa.
word.maori: Kia mate hoki te tangata, katahi ka whai mana te ohaki: ka u tonu ranei i te mea e ora ana te tangata nana i whakatakoto?
word.cebuano: Kay ang tugon tungod sa kamatayon mapalig-on: kay kini dili magapulos samtang ang nagabuhat niini buhi pa.
word.hebrewmodern: כי רק במות המת תכון דיתיקי ואיננה בתקפה בעוד מקימה בחיים׃
word.textusreceptus: διαθηκη γαρ επι νεκροις βεβαια επει μηποτε ισχυει οτε ζη ο διαθεμενος
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed, and was delivered of a child when she was past age, because she judged him faithful who had promised.
word.thailand: โดยความเชื่อ นางซาราห์เองเช่นกันจึงได้รับพลังตั้งครรภ์และได้คลอดบุตรเมื่อชรามากแล้ว เพราะนางถือว่าพระองค์ผู้ได้ทรงประทานพระสัญญานั้นทรงเป็นผู้สัตย์ซื่อ
word.spanish1909: Por la fe también la misma Sara, siendo estéril, recibió fuerza para concebir simiente; y parió aun fuera del tiempo de la edad, porque creyó ser fiel el que lo había prometido.
word.latinvulgate: Fide et ipsa Sara sterilis virtutem in conceptionem seminis accepit, etiam præter tempus ætatis : quoniam fidelem credidit esse eum qui repromiserat.
word.italian1927: Per fede Sara anch’ella, benché fuori d’età, ricevette forza di concepire, perché reputò fedele Colui che avea fatto la promessa.
word.german1912: Durch den Glauben empfing auch Sara Kraft, daß sie schwanger ward und gebar über die Zeit ihres Alters; denn sie achtete ihn treu, der es verheißen hatte.
word.french1910: C'est par la foi que Sara elle-même, malgré son âge avancé, fut rendue capable d'avoir une postérité, parce qu'elle crut à la fidélité de celui qui avait fait la promesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因著信，甚至撒拉，她雖然過了生育的年齡，還是能夠懷孕，因為她認為那應許她的是信實的。
word.korean: 믿음으로 사라 자신도 나이 늙어 단산하였으나 잉태하는 힘을 얻었으니 이는 약속하신 이를 미쁘신 줄 앎이라
word.tagalog: Sa pananampalataya si Sara rin ay tumanggap ng lakas upang ipaglihi ang binhi, nang lipas na ang kaniyang gulang, palibhasa'y inari niyang tapat ang nangako:
word.maori: Me Hera ano hoki, na te whakapono ia i whai kaha ai, i hapu ai, a whanau ana tana tama i te mea kua taka ke ona tau; i mahara hoki ia he pono ta te kaiwhakaari mai.
word.cebuano: Tungod sa pagtoo bisan si Sara sa iyang kaugalingon nakadawat sa gahum sa pagpanamkon sa diha nga minglapas na ang panuigon, sanglit iyang giisip nga matinumanon kadtong nagsaad.
word.hebrewmodern: באמונה שרה גם היא קבלה הכח להזריע ותלד אחרי בלתה כי חשבה לנאמן את המבטיח׃
word.textusreceptus: πιστει και αυτη σαρρα δυναμιν εις καταβολην σπερματος ελαβεν και παρα καιρον ηλικιας ετεκεν επει πιστον ηγησατο τον επαγγειλαμενον
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.
word.thailand: และพระเจ้าแห่งบรรดาพระคุณทั้งปวง ผู้ได้ทรงเรียกให้เราทั้งหลายเข้าในสง่าราศีนิรันดร์ของพระองค์โดยพระเยซูคริสต์ ครั้นท่านทั้งหลายทนทุกข์อยู่หน่อยหนึ่งแล้ว พระองค์เองจะทรงโปรดให้ท่านทั้งหลายถึงที่สำเร็จ ให้ตั้งมั่นคง ให้ท่านมีกำลังมากขึ้น และทรงให้ท่านมีพื้นฐานมั่นคง
word.spanish1909: Mas el Dios de toda gracia, que nos ha llamado á su gloria eterna por Jesucristo, después que hubiereis un poco de tiempo padecido, él mismo os perfeccione, coforme, corrobore y establezca.
word.latinvulgate: Deus autem omnis gratiæ, qui vocavit nos in æternam suam gloriam in Christo Jesu, modicum passos ipse perficiet, confirmabit, solidabitque.
word.italian1927: Or l’Iddio d’ogni grazia, il quale vi ha chiamati alla sua eterna gloria in Cristo, dopo che avrete sofferto per breve tempo, vi perfezionerà Egli stesso, vi renderà saldi, vi fortificherà.
word.german1912: Der Gott aber aller Gnade, der uns berufen hat zu seiner ewigen Herrlichkeit in Christo Jesu, der wird euch, die ihr eine kleine Zeit leidet, vollbereiten, stärken, kräftigen, gründen.
word.french1910: Le Dieu de toute grâce, qui vous a appelés en Jésus-Christ à sa gloire éternelle, après que vous aurez souffert un peu de temps, vous perfectionnera lui-même, vous affermira, vous fortifiera, vous rendra inébranlables.
